Angle:Forward.description: (Shared) Method: Angle:Forward() Returns a normal vector facing in the direction that the angle points.

bf_read:ReadAngle.description: (Client) Method: bf_read:ReadAngle() Reads an returns an angle object from the bitstream.

bf_read:ReadString.description: (Client) Method: bf_read:ReadString() Reads a null terminated string from the bitstream.

bf_read:ReadVector.description: (Client) Method: bf_read:ReadVector() Reads a special encoded vector from the bitstream and returns it, this function is not suitable to send normals.

bf_read:ReadVectorNormal.description: (Client) Method: bf_read:ReadVectorNormal() Reads a special encoded vector normal from the bitstream and returns it, this function is not suitable to send vectors that represent a position.

bf_read:Reset.description: (Client) Method: bf_read:Reset() Rewinds the bitstream so it can be read again.

CLuaEmitter:Add.description: (Client) Method: CLuaEmitter:Add() Creates a new CLuaParticle with the given material and position.

CLuaEmitter:Finish.description: (Client) Method: CLuaEmitter:Finish() Removes the emitter and all its particles.

CLuaEmitter:GetNumActiveParticles.description: (Client) Method: CLuaEmitter:GetNumActiveParticles() Returns the amount of active particles of this emitter.

CLuaEmitter:GetPos.description: (Client) Method: CLuaEmitter:GetPos() Returns the position of this emitter. This is set when creating the emitter with {{GlobalFunction|ParticleEmitter}}.

CLuaEmitter:SetParticleCullRadius.description: (Client) Method: CLuaEmitter:SetParticleCullRadius() The function name has not much in common with its actual function, it applies a radius to every particles that affects the building of the bounding box, as it, usually is constructed by the particle that has the lowest x, y and z and the highest x, y and z, this function just adds/subtracts the radius and inflates the bounding box.

CNavArea:AddToClosedList.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:AddToClosedList() Adds this CNavArea}} to the list of positions that have been checked by {{Type|NextBot's A* search algorithm.

CNavArea:ComputeAdjacentConnectionHeight.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:ComputeAdjacentConnectionHeightChange() Returns the height difference between the edges of two connected navareas.

CNavArea:ComputeGroundHeightChange.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:ComputeGroundHeightChange() Returns the height difference on the Z axis of the two CNavArea}}s. This is calculated from the center most point on both {{Type|CNavAreas.

CNavArea:Draw.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:Draw() Draws this navarea on debug overlay.

CNavArea:DrawSpots.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:DrawSpots() Draws the hiding spots on debug overlay. This includes sniper/exposed spots too!

CNavArea:GetAdjacentAreas.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:GetAdjacentAreas() Returns a table of all the CNavArea}}s that have a ( one and two way ) connection '''from''' this {{Type|CNavArea.

CNavArea:GetAdjacentAreasAtSide.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:GetAdjacentAreasAtSide() Returns a table of all the CNavArea}}s that have a ( one and two way ) connection '''from''' this {{Type|CNavArea in given direction.

CNavArea:GetAdjacentCount.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:GetAdjacentCount() Returns the amount of CNavArea}}s that have a connection ( one and two way ) '''from''' this {{Type|CNavArea.

CNavArea:GetAdjacentCountAtSide.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:GetAdjacentCountAtSide() Returns the amount of CNavArea}}s that have a connection ( one or two way ) '''from''' this {{Type|CNavArea in given direction.

CNavArea:GetCenter.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:GetCenter() Returns the center most vector point for the given CNavArea.

CNavArea:GetClosestPointOnArea.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:GetClosestPointOnArea() Returns the closest point of this Nav Area from the given position.

CNavArea:GetCorner.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:GetCorner() Returns the vector position of the corner for the given CNavArea.

CNavArea:GetCostSoFar.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:GetCostSoFar() Internal function used when generating a path from one point to another in {{ClassFunction|PathFollower|Compute}}.

CNavArea:GetHidingSpots.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:GetHidingSpots() Returns a table of good hiding spots in this area

CNavArea:GetID.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:GetID() Returns this CNavAreas unique ID.

CNavArea:GetLaddersAtSide.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:GetLaddersAtSide() Returns all CNavLadder}}s that have a ( one or two way ) connection '''from''' ( one and two way ) this {{Type|CNavArea in given direction.

CNavArea:GetParentHow.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:GetParentHow() Returns how this CNavArea is connected to its parent.

CNavArea:GetRandomAdjacentAreaAtSide.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:GetRandomAdjacentAreaAtSide() Returns a random CNavArea}} that has an outgoing ( one or two way ) connection '''from''' this {{Type|CNavArea in given direction.

CNavArea:GetSizeY.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:GetSizeY() Returns the height of this Nav Area.

CNavArea:GetZ.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:GetZ() Returns the elevation of this Nav Area at the given position.

CNavArea:HasAttributes.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:HasAttributes() Returns true if the given CNavArea has this attribute flag set.

CNavArea:IsConnected.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:IsConnected() Returns whether this CNavArea}} has an outgoing ( one or two way ) connection '''to''' given {{Type|CNavArea.

CNavArea:IsConnectedAtSide.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:IsConnectedAtSide() Returns whether this CNavArea}} has an outgoing ( one or two way ) connection '''to''' given {{Type|CNavArea in given direction.

CNavArea:IsOverlappingArea.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:IsOverlappingArea() Returns true if this CNavArea}} is overlapping the given {{Type|CNavArea.

CNavArea:IsRoughlySquare.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:IsRoughlySquare() Returns if we're shaped like a square.

CNavArea:IsUnderwater.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:IsUnderwater() Whether this Nav Area is placed underwater.

CNavArea:IsValid.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:IsValid() Returns whether this CNavArea is valid or not.

CNavArea:IsVisible.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:IsVisible() Returns whether we can be seen from the given position.

CNavArea:SetAttributes.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:SetAttributes() Sets the attributes for given CNavArea.

CNavArea:SetParent.description: (Server) Method: CNavArea:SetParent() Sets the new parent of this CNavArea.

CNavLadder:GetBottomArea.description: (Server) Method: CNavLadder:GetBottomArea() Returns the bottom area of the CNavLadder.

CNavLadder:GetID.description: (Server) Method: CNavLadder:GetID() Returns this CNavLadders unique ID.

CNavLadder:GetLength.description: (Server) Method: CNavLadder:GetLength() Returns the length of the ladder.

CNavLadder:GetNormal.description: (Server) Method: CNavLadder:GetNormal() Returns the direction of this CNavLadder. ( The direction in which players back will be facing if they are looking directly at the ladder )

CNavLadder:GetTopBehindArea.description: (Server) Method: CNavLadder:GetTopBehindArea() Returns the top behind CNavArea}} of the {{Type|CNavLadder.

CNavLadder:GetTopForwardArea.description: (Server) Method: CNavLadder:GetTopForwardArea() Returns the top forward CNavArea}} of the {{Type|CNavLadder.

CNavLadder:GetTopLeftArea.description: (Server) Method: CNavLadder:GetTopLeftArea() Returns the top left CNavArea}} of the {{Type|CNavLadder.

CNavLadder:GetTopRightArea.description: (Server) Method: CNavLadder:GetTopRightArea() Returns the top right CNavArea}} of the {{Type|CNavLadder.

CNavLadder:IsConnectedAtSide.description: (Server) Method: CNavLadder:IsConnectedAtSide() Returns whether this CNavLadder}} has an outgoing ( one or two way ) connection '''to''' given {{Type|CNavArea in given direction.

CNavLadder:IsValid.description: (Server) Method: CNavLadder:IsValid() Returns whether this CNavLadder is valid or not.

CNavLadder:SetBottomArea.description: (Server) Method: CNavLadder:SetBottomArea() Sets the bottom area of the CNavLadder.

CNavLadder:SetTopBehindArea.description: (Server) Method: CNavLadder:SetTopBehindArea() Sets the top behind area of the CNavLadder.

CNavLadder:SetTopForwardArea.description: (Server) Method: CNavLadder:SetTopForwardArea() Sets the top forward area of the CNavLadder.

CNavLadder:SetTopLeftArea.description: (Server) Method: CNavLadder:SetTopLeftArea() Sets the top left area of the CNavLadder.

CNavLadder:SetTopRightArea.description: (Server) Method: CNavLadder:SetTopRightArea() Sets the top right area of the CNavLadder.

CNewParticleEffect:AddControlPoint.body: AddControlPoint(${1:number cpID}, ${2:Entity ent}, ${3:number partAttachment}, ${4:number entAttachment=0}, ${5:Vector offset=Vector( 0, 0, 0 )})$0
CNewParticleEffect:AddControlPoint.description: (Client) Method: CNewParticleEffect:AddControlPoint() Adds a control point to the particle system.

CNewParticleEffect:GetEffectName.description: (Client) Method: CNewParticleEffect:GetEffectName() Returns the name of the particle effect this system is set to emit.

CNewParticleEffect:GetHighestControlPoin.description: (Client) Method: CNewParticleEffect:GetHighestControlPoint() Returns the highest control point number for given particle system.

CNewParticleEffect:GetOwner.description: (Client) Method: CNewParticleEffect:GetOwner() Returns the owner of the particle system, the entity the particle system is attached to.

CNewParticleEffect:IsFinished.description: (Client) Method: CNewParticleEffect:IsFinished() Returns whether the particle system has finished emitting particles or not.

CNewParticleEffect:IsValid.description: (Client) Method: CNewParticleEffect:IsValid() Returns whether the particle system is valid or not.

CNewParticleEffect:IsViewModelEffect.description: (Client) Method: CNewParticleEffect:IsViewModelEffect() Returns whether the particle system is intended to be used on a view model?

CNewParticleEffect:Render.description: (Client) Method: CNewParticleEffect:Render() Forces the particle system to render using current rendering context.

CNewParticleEffect:Restart.description: (Client) Method: CNewParticleEffect:Restart() Forces the particle system to restart emitting particles.

CNewParticleEffect:SetControlPoint.description: (Client) Method: CNewParticleEffect:SetControlPoint() Sets a value for given control point.

CNewParticleEffect:SetControlPointEntity.description: (Client) Method: CNewParticleEffect:SetControlPointEntity() Essentially makes child control point follow the parent entity.

CNewParticleEffect:SetControlPointForwar.description: (Client) Method: CNewParticleEffect:SetControlPointForwardVector() Sets the forward direction for given control point.

CNewParticleEffect:SetControlPointOrient.description: (Client) Method: CNewParticleEffect:SetControlPointOrientation() Sets the orientation for given control point.

CNewParticleEffect:SetControlPointParent.description: (Client) Method: CNewParticleEffect:SetControlPointParent() Essentially makes child control point follow the parent control point.

CNewParticleEffect:SetControlPointRightV.description: (Client) Method: CNewParticleEffect:SetControlPointRightVector() Sets the right direction for given control point.

CNewParticleEffect:SetControlPointUpVect.description: (Client) Method: CNewParticleEffect:SetControlPointUpVector() Sets the upward direction for given control point.

CNewParticleEffect:SetShouldDraw.description: (Client) Method: CNewParticleEffect:SetShouldDraw() Forces the particle system to stop automatically rendering.

CNewParticleEffect:SetSortOrigin.description: (Client) Method: CNewParticleEffect:SetSortOrigin() Sets the sort origin for given particle system. This is used as a helper to determine which particles are in front of which.

CNewParticleEffect:StartEmission.description: (Client) Method: CNewParticleEffect:StartEmission() Starts the particle emission.

CNewParticleEffect:StopEmission.description: (Client) Method: CNewParticleEffect:StopEmission() Stops the particle emission.

CNewParticleEffect:StopEmissionAndDestro.description: (Client) Method: CNewParticleEffect:StopEmissionAndDestroyImmediately() Stops particle emission and destroys all particles instantly.

ConVar:GetBool.description: (Shared) Method: ConVar:GetBool() Tries to convert the current string value of a ConVar to a boolean.

ConVar:GetDefault.description: (Shared) Method: ConVar:GetDefault() Returns the default value of the ConVar

ConVar:GetFloat.description: (Shared) Method: ConVar:GetFloat() Attempts to convert the ConVar value to a float

ConVar:GetHelpText.description: (Shared) Method: ConVar:GetHelpText() Returns the help text assigned to that convar.

ConVar:GetInt.description: (Shared) Method: ConVar:GetInt() Attempts to convert the ConVar value to a integer.

ConVar:GetName.description: (Shared) Method: ConVar:GetName() Returns the name of the ConVar.

ConVar:GetString.description: (Shared) Method: ConVar:GetString() Returns the current ConVar value as a string.

ConVar:SetBool.description: (Shared) Method: ConVar:SetBool() Sets a ConVar's value to 1 or 0 based on the input boolean. This can only be ran on ConVars created from within Lua.

ConVar:SetFloat.description: (Shared) Method: ConVar:SetFloat() Sets a ConVar's value to to the input number. This can only be ran on ConVars created from within Lua.

ConVar:SetInt.description: (Shared) Method: ConVar:SetInt() Sets a ConVar's value to the input number after converting it to an integer. This can only be ran on ConVars created from within Lua.

ConVar:SetString.description: (Shared) Method: ConVar:SetString() Sets a ConVar's value to the input string. This can only be ran on ConVars created from within Lua.

CRecipientFilter:AddAllPlayers.description: (Server) Method: CRecipientFilter:AddAllPlayers() Adds all players to the recipient filter.

CRecipientFilter:AddPAS.description: (Server) Method: CRecipientFilter:AddPAS() Adds all players that are in the same PAS as this position.

CRecipientFilter:AddPlayer.description: (Server) Method: CRecipientFilter:AddPlayer() Adds a player to the recipient filter

CRecipientFilter:AddPVS.description: (Server) Method: CRecipientFilter:AddPVS() Adds all players that are in the same PVS as this position.

CRecipientFilter:AddRecipientsByTeam.description: (Server) Method: CRecipientFilter:AddRecipientsByTeam() Adds all players that are on the given team to the filter.

CRecipientFilter:GetCount.description: (Server) Method: CRecipientFilter:GetCount() Returns the number of valid players in the recipient filter.

CRecipientFilter:GetPlayers.description: (Server) Method: CRecipientFilter:GetPlayers() Returns a table of all valid players currently in the recipient filter.

CRecipientFilter:RemoveAllPlayers.description: (Server) Method: CRecipientFilter:RemoveAllPlayers() Removes all players from the recipient filter.

CRecipientFilter:RemovePAS.description: (Server) Method: CRecipientFilter:RemovePAS() Removes all players from the filter that are in Potentially Audible Set for given position.

CRecipientFilter:RemovePlayer.description: (Server) Method: CRecipientFilter:RemovePlayer() Removes the player from the recipient filter.

CRecipientFilter:RemovePVS.description: (Server) Method: CRecipientFilter:RemovePVS() Removes all players that can see this PVS from the recipient filter.

CRecipientFilter:RemoveRecipientsByTeam.description: (Server) Method: CRecipientFilter:RemoveRecipientsByTeam() Removes all players that are on the given team from the filter.

CRecipientFilter:RemoveRecipientsNotOnTe.description: (Server) Method: CRecipientFilter:RemoveRecipientsNotOnTeam() Removes all players that are not on the given team from the filter.

CSEnt:Remove.description: (Client) Method: CSEnt:Remove() Removes the clientside entity

CSoundPatch:ChangePitch.description: (Shared) Method: CSoundPatch:ChangePitch() Adjust the pitch, alias the speed at which the sound is being played.

CSoundPatch:ChangeVolume.description: (Shared) Method: CSoundPatch:ChangeVolume() Adjusts the volume of the sound played.

CSoundPatch:FadeOut.description: (Shared) Method: CSoundPatch:FadeOut() Fades out the volume of the sound from the current volume to 0 in the given amount of seconds.

CSoundPatch:GetDSP.description: (Shared) Method: CSoundPatch:GetDSP() Returns the DSP ( Digital Signal Processor ) effect for the sound.

CSoundPatch:GetPitch.description: (Shared) Method: CSoundPatch:GetPitch() Returns the current pitch.

CSoundPatch:GetSoundLevel.description: (Shared) Method: CSoundPatch:GetSoundLevel() Returns the current sound level.

CSoundPatch:GetVolume.description: (Shared) Method: CSoundPatch:GetVolume() Returns the current volume.

CSoundPatch:IsPlaying.description: (Shared) Method: CSoundPatch:IsPlaying() Returns whenever the sound is being played.

CSoundPatch:Play.description: (Shared) Method: CSoundPatch:Play() Starts to play the sound.

CSoundPatch:PlayEx.description: (Shared) Method: CSoundPatch:PlayEx() Same as {{ClassFunction|CSoundPatch|Play}} but with 2 extra arguments allowing to set volume and pitch directly.

CSoundPatch:SetDSP.description: (Shared) Method: CSoundPatch:SetDSP() Sets the DSP ( Digital Signal Processor ) effect for the sound. Similar to {{ClassFunction|Player|SetDSP}}

CSoundPatch:SetSoundLevel.description: (Shared) Method: CSoundPatch:SetSoundLevel() Sets the sound level in decibel.

CSoundPatch:Stop.description: (Shared) Method: CSoundPatch:Stop() Stops the sound from being played.

CTakeDamageInfo:AddDamage.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:AddDamage() Increases the damage by damageIncrease.

CTakeDamageInfo:GetAmmoType.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:GetAmmoType() Returns the ammo type used by the weapon that inflicted the damage.

CTakeDamageInfo:GetAttacker.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:GetAttacker() Returns the attacker ( character who originated the attack ), for example a player or an NPC that shot the weapon.

CTakeDamageInfo:GetBaseDamage.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:GetBaseDamage() Returns the initial unmodified by skill level ( {{LibraryFunction|game|GetSkillLevel}} ) damage.

CTakeDamageInfo:GetDamage.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:GetDamage() Returns the total damage.

CTakeDamageInfo:GetDamageForce.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:GetDamageForce() Returns a vector representing the damage force.

CTakeDamageInfo:GetDamagePosition.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:GetDamagePosition() Returns the position where the damage was or is going to be applied to.

CTakeDamageInfo:GetDamageType.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:GetDamageType() Returns a bitflag which indicates the damage type(s) of the damage.

CTakeDamageInfo:GetInflictor.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:GetInflictor() Returns the inflictor of the damage. This is not necessarily a weapon.

CTakeDamageInfo:GetMaxDamage.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:GetMaxDamage() Returns the maximum damage.

CTakeDamageInfo:GetReportedPosition.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:GetReportedPosition() Returns the initial, unmodified position where the damage occured.

CTakeDamageInfo:IsBulletDamage.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:IsBulletDamage() Returns true if the damage was caused by a bullet.

CTakeDamageInfo:IsDamageType.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:IsDamageType() Returns whenever the damageinfo contains the damage type specified.

CTakeDamageInfo:IsExplosionDamage.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:IsExplosionDamage() Returns whenever the damageinfo contains explosion damage.

CTakeDamageInfo:IsFallDamage.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:IsFallDamage() Returns whenever the damageinfo contains fall damage.

CTakeDamageInfo:ScaleDamage.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:ScaleDamage() Scales the damage by the given value.

CTakeDamageInfo:SetAmmoType.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:SetAmmoType() Changes the ammo type used by the weapon that inflicted the damage.

CTakeDamageInfo:SetAttacker.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:SetAttacker() Sets the attacker ( character who originated the attack ) of the damage, for example a player or an NPC.

CTakeDamageInfo:SetDamage.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:SetDamage() Sets the amount of damage.

CTakeDamageInfo:SetDamageBonus.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:SetDamageBonus() Adds bonus damage, like {{ClassFunction|CTakeDamageInfo|AddDamage}} does.

CTakeDamageInfo:SetDamageForce.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:SetDamageForce() Sets the directional force of the damage.

CTakeDamageInfo:SetDamagePosition.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:SetDamagePosition() Sets the position of where the damage gets applied to.

CTakeDamageInfo:SetDamageType.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:SetDamageType() Sets the damage type.

CTakeDamageInfo:SetInflictor.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:SetInflictor() Sets the inflictor of the damage for example a weapon.

CTakeDamageInfo:SetMaxDamage.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:SetMaxDamage() Sets the maximum damage the object can cause.

CTakeDamageInfo:SetReportedPosition.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:SetReportedPosition() Sets the origin of the damage.

CTakeDamageInfo:SubtractDamage.description: (Shared) Method: CTakeDamageInfo:SubtractDamage() Subtracts the specified amount from the damage.

CUserCmd:ClearButtons.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:ClearButtons() Removes all keys from the command. Doesn't prevent movement, see {{ClassFunction|CUserCmd|ClearMovement}} for this.

CUserCmd:ClearMovement.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:ClearMovement() Clears the movement from the command.

CUserCmd:CommandNumber.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:CommandNumber() Returns an increasing number representing the index of the user cmd. The value returned is occasionally 0 inside {{HookFunction|GM|CreateMove}}, so it's advised to check for a non-zero value if you wish to get the correct number.

CUserCmd:GetButtons.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:GetButtons() Returns a bitflag indicating which buttons are pressed.

CUserCmd:GetForwardMove.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:GetForwardMove() The speed the client wishes to move forward with, negative if the clients wants to move backwards.

CUserCmd:GetImpulse.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:GetImpulse() Gets the current impulse from the client, usually 0.

CUserCmd:GetMouseWheel.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:GetMouseWheel() Returns the scroll delta as whole number.

CUserCmd:GetMouseX.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:GetMouseX() Returns the delta of the angular horizontal mouse movement of the player.

CUserCmd:GetMouseY.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:GetMouseY() Returns the delta of the angular vertical mouse movement of the player.

CUserCmd:GetSideMove.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:GetSideMove() The speed the client wishes to move sideways with, positive if it wants to move right, negative if it wants to move left.

CUserCmd:GetUpMove.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:GetUpMove() The speed the client wishes to move up with, negative if the clients wants to move down.

CUserCmd:GetViewAngles.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:GetViewAngles() Gets the direction the player is looking in.

CUserCmd:IsForced.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:IsForced() When players are not sending usercommands to the server (often due to lag), their last usercommand will be executed multiple times as a backup. This function returns true if that is happening.

CUserCmd:KeyDown.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:KeyDown() Returns true if the specified button(s) is pressed.

CUserCmd:RemoveKey.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:RemoveKey() Removed a key bit from the current key bitflag.

CUserCmd:SelectWeapon.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:SelectWeapon() Forces the associated player to select a weapon.

CUserCmd:SetButtons.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:SetButtons() Sets the buttons bitflag

CUserCmd:SetForwardMove.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:SetForwardMove() Sets speed the client wishes to move forward with, negative if the clients wants to move backwards.

CUserCmd:SetImpulse.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:SetImpulse() Sets the impulse to be send together with the command.

CUserCmd:SetMouseWheel.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:SetMouseWheel() Sets the scroll delta.

CUserCmd:SetMouseX.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:SetMouseX() Sets the delta of the angular horizontal mouse movement of the player.

CUserCmd:SetMouseY.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:SetMouseY() Sets the delta of the angular vertical mouse movement of the player.

CUserCmd:SetSideMove.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:SetSideMove() Sets speed the client wishes to move sidewards with, positive to move right, negative to move left.

CUserCmd:SetUpMove.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:SetUpMove() Sets speed the client wishes to move upwards with, negative to move down.

CUserCmd:SetViewAngles.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:SetViewAngles() Sets the direction the client wants to move in.

CUserCmd:TickCount.description: (Shared) Method: CUserCmd:TickCount() Returns tick count since joining the server. This will always return 0 for bots.

DFrame:GetTitle.description: (Client) Method: DFrame:GetTitle() Gets the title of the frame.

Entity:Activate.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:Activate() Activates the entity. This needs to be used on some entities (like constraints) after being spawned.

Entity:AddCallback.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:AddCallback() Add a callback function to a specific event. This is used instead of hooks to avoid calling empty functions unnecessarily.

Entity:AddEffects.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:AddEffects() Applies an engine effect to an entity.

Entity:AddFlags.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:AddFlags() Adds flags to the entity.

Entity:AddGesture.description: (Server) Method: Entity:AddGesture() Adds a gesture animation to the entity and plays it.

Entity:AddGestureSequence.description: (Server) Method: Entity:AddGestureSequence() Adds a gesture animation to the entity and plays it.

Entity:AddLayeredSequence.description: (Server) Method: Entity:AddLayeredSequence() Adds a gesture animation to the entity and plays it.

Entity:AddSolidFlags.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:AddSolidFlags() Adds solid flag(s) to the entity.

Entity:AddToMotionController.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:AddToMotionController() Adds a PhysObj}}ect to the entity's motion controller so that {{HookFunction|ENTITY|PhysicsSimulate}} will be called for given {{Type|PhysObject as well.

Entity:AlignAngles.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:AlignAngles() Returns an angle based on the ones inputted that you can use to align an object.

Entity:BecomeRagdollOnClient.description: (Client) Method: Entity:BecomeRagdollOnClient() Spawns a clientside ragdoll for the entity, positioning it in place of the original entity, and makes the entity invisible. It doesn't preserve flex values (face posing) as CSRagdolls don't support flex.

Entity:Blocked.description: (Server) Method: Entity:Blocked() {{Internal}} Dispatches blocked events to this entity's blocked handler. This function is only useful when interacting with entities like func_movelinear.

Entity:BodyTarget.description: (Server) Method: Entity:BodyTarget() Returns a centered vector of this entity, NPCs use this internally to aim at their targets.

Entity:BoneHasFlag.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:BoneHasFlag() Returns whether the entity's bone has the flag or not.

Entity:BoneLength.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:BoneLength() This function takes the boneID and returns the length of it in an unrounded decimal

Entity:BoundingRadius.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:BoundingRadius() Returns the distance between the center of the bounding box and the furthest bounding box corner.

Entity:CallOnRemove.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:CallOnRemove() Causes a specified function to be run if the entity is removed by any means.

Entity:ClearPoseParameters.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:ClearPoseParameters() Resets all pose parameters such as aim_yaw, aim_pitch and rotation.

Entity:CollisionRulesChanged.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:CollisionRulesChanged() Declares that the collision rules of the entity have changed, and subsequent calls for {{HookFunction|GM|ShouldCollide}} with this entity may return a different value than they did previously.

Entity:CreatedByMap.description: (Server) Method: Entity:CreatedByMap() Returns whether the entity was created by map or not.

Entity:CreateParticleEffect.description: (Client) Method: Entity:CreateParticleEffect() Creates a clientside particle system attached to the entity.

Entity:CreateShadow.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:CreateShadow() Draws the shadow of an entity.

Entity:DeleteOnRemove.description: (Server) Method: Entity:DeleteOnRemove() Whenever the entity is removed, entityToRemove will be removed also.

Entity:DestroyShadow.description: (Client) Method: Entity:DestroyShadow() Removes the shadow for the entity.

Entity:DisableMatrix.description: (Client) Method: Entity:DisableMatrix() Disables an active matrix.

Entity:DispatchTraceAttack.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:DispatchTraceAttack() Performs a trace attack.

Entity:DontDeleteOnRemove.description: (Server) Method: Entity:DontDeleteOnRemove() This removes the argument entity from an ent's list of entities to 'delete on remove'

Entity:DrawModel.description: (Client) Method: Entity:DrawModel() Draws the entity or model.

Entity:DrawShadow.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:DrawShadow() Sets whether an entity's shadow should be drawn.

Entity:DropToFloor.description: (Server) Method: Entity:DropToFloor() Move an entity down until it collides with something.

Entity:EmitSound.body: EmitSound(${1:string soundName}, ${2:number soundLevel=75}, ${3:number pitchPercent=100}, ${4:number volume=1}, ${5:number channel=CHAN_AUTO})$0
Entity:EmitSound.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:EmitSound() Plays a sound on an entity. If run clientside, the sound will only be heard locally.

Entity:EnableConstraints.description: (Server) Method: Entity:EnableConstraints() Toggles the constraints of this ragdoll entity on and off.

Entity:EnableCustomCollisions.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:EnableCustomCollisions() Flags an entity as using custom lua defined collisions. Fixes entities having spongy player collisions or not hitting traces, such as after {{ClassFunction|Entity|PhysicsFromMesh}}

Entity:EnableMatrix.description: (Client) Method: Entity:EnableMatrix() Can be used to apply a custom VMatrix}} to the entity, mostly used for scaling the model by a {{Type|Vector.

Entity:EntIndex.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:EntIndex() Gets the unique entity index of an entity.

Entity:Extinguish.description: (Server) Method: Entity:Extinguish() Extinguishes the entity if it is on fire.

Entity:EyeAngles.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:EyeAngles() Returns the direction a player/npc/ragdoll is looking as a world-oriented angle.

Entity:EyePos.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:EyePos() Returns the position of an Player/NPC's view, or two vectors for ragdolls (one for each eye)

Entity:FindBodygroupByName.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:FindBodygroupByName() Searches for bodygroup with given name.

Entity:FindTransitionSequence.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:FindTransitionSequence() Returns a transition from the given start and end sequence.

Entity:Fire.description: (Server) Method: Entity:Fire() Fires an entity's input. You can find inputs for most entities on the [https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Output Valve Developer Wiki]

Entity:FollowBone.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:FollowBone() Makes an entity follow another entity's bone.

Entity:ForcePlayerDrop.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:ForcePlayerDrop() Forces the Entity to be dropped, when it is being held by a player's gravitygun or physgun.

Entity:FrameAdvance.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:FrameAdvance() Advances the cycle of an animated entity by the given delta. Since cycle is a value between 0 and 1, delta should be as well.

Entity:GetAbsVelocity.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetAbsVelocity() Returns the velocity of the entity, in coordinates relative to the world.

Entity:GetAngles.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetAngles() Gets the angles of given entity.

Entity:GetAnimInfo.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetAnimInfo() Returns a table containing the number of frames, flags, name, and FPS of an entity's animation ID.

Entity:GetAnimTime.description: (Client) Method: Entity:GetAnimTime() Returns the last time the entity had an animation update. Returns 0 if the entity doesn't animate.

Entity:GetAttachment.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetAttachment() Gets the orientation and position of the attachment by its ID, returns nothing if the attachment does not exist.

Entity:GetAttachments.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetAttachments() Returns a table containing all attachments of the given entitys model.

Entity:GetBaseVelocity.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetBaseVelocity() Returns the base velocity of the entity. "Velocity of the thing we're standing on".

Entity:GetBloodColor.description: (Server) Method: Entity:GetBloodColor() Returns the blood color of this entity. This can be set with {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetBloodColor}}.

Entity:GetBodygroup.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetBodygroup() Gets the exact value for specific bodygroup of given entity.

Entity:GetBodygroupCount.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetBodygroupCount() Returns the count of possible values for this bodygroup.

Entity:GetBodygroupName.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetBodygroupName() Gets the name of specific bodygroup for given entity.

Entity:GetBodyGroups.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetBodyGroups() Returns a list of all attachments of the entity.

Entity:GetBoneController.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetBoneController() Returns the value of the bone controller with the specified ID.

Entity:GetBoneCount.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetBoneCount() Returns the amount of bones in the entity.

Entity:GetBoneMatrix.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetBoneMatrix() Returns the matrix ( position / rotation transform ) of a given bone entity.

Entity:GetBoneName.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetBoneName() Returns name of given bone id.

Entity:GetBoneParent.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetBoneParent() Returns parent bone of given bone.

Entity:GetBonePosition.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetBonePosition() Returns the position and angle of the given attachment, relative to the world.

Entity:GetChildBones.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetChildBones() Returns ids of child bones of given bone.

Entity:GetChildren.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetChildren() Gets the children of the entity - that is, every entity whose parent is this entity.

Entity:GetClass.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetClass() Returns the classname of a entity. This is often the name of the Lua file or folder containing the files for the entity

Entity:GetCollisionBounds.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetCollisionBounds() Returns an entity's collision bounding box. In most cases, this will return the same bounding box as {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetModelBounds}} unless the entity does not have a physics mesh or it has a PhysObj different from the default.

Entity:GetCollisionGroup.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetCollisionGroup() Returns the entity's collision group

Entity:GetColor.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetColor() Returns the color the entity is set to.

Entity:GetConstrainedEntities.description: (Server) Method: Entity:GetConstrainedEntities() Returns the two entities involved in a constraint ent

Entity:GetConstrainedPhysObjects.description: (Server) Method: Entity:GetConstrainedPhysObjects() Returns the two entities physobjects involved in a constraint ent

Entity:GetCreationID.description: (Server) Method: Entity:GetCreationID() Returns entity's creation ID. Unlike {{ClassFunction|Entity|EntIndex}} or  {{ClassFunction|Entity|MapCreationID}}, it will always increase and old values won't be reused.

Entity:GetCreationTime.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetCreationTime() Returns the time the entity was created on, relative to {{GlobalFunction|CurTime}}.

Entity:GetCreator.description: (Server) Method: Entity:GetCreator() Gets the creator of the SENT.

Entity:GetCustomCollisionCheck.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetCustomCollisionCheck() Returns whether this entity uses custom collision check set by {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetCustomCollisionCheck}}.

Entity:GetCycle.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetCycle() Returns the frame of the currently played sequence.

Entity:GetEffects.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetEffects() Returns a bit flag of all engine effect flags of the entity.

Entity:GetEFlags.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetEFlags() Returns a bit flag of all engine flags of the entity.

Entity:GetElasticity.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetElasticity() Returns the elasticity of this entity, used by some flying entities such as the Helicopter NPC to determine how much it should bounce around when colliding.

Entity:GetFlags.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetFlags() Returns all flags of given entity.

Entity:GetFlexBounds.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetFlexBounds() Returns acceptable value range for the flex.

Entity:GetFlexNum.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetFlexNum() Returns the number of flexes this entity has.

Entity:GetFlexScale.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetFlexScale() Returns the flex scale of the entity.

Entity:GetFlexWeight.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetFlexWeight() Returns current weight ( value ) of the flex.

Entity:GetForward.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetForward() Returns the forward vector of the entity, as a normalized direction vector

Entity:GetFriction.description: (Server) Method: Entity:GetFriction() Returns how much friction an entity has. Entities default to 1 (100%) and can be higher or even negative.

Entity:GetGravity.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetGravity() Gets the gravity multiplier of the entity.

Entity:GetGroundEntity.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetGroundEntity() Returns the object the entity is standing on.

Entity:GetGroundSpeedVelocity.description: (Server) Method: Entity:GetGroundSpeedVelocity() Returns the entity's ground speed velocity, which is based on the entity's walk/run speed and/or the ground speed of their sequence ( {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetSequenceGroundSpeed}} ). Will return an empty Vector if the entity isn't moving on the ground.

Entity:GetHitBoxBone.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetHitBoxBone() Gets the bone of a hit box

Entity:GetHitBoxBounds.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetHitBoxBounds() Gets the bounding box of a hit box

Entity:GetHitBoxCount.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetHitBoxCount() Gets how many hit boxes are in a given hit box group

Entity:GetHitBoxGroupCount.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetHitBoxGroupCount() Returns the number of hit box groups that an entity has.

Entity:GetHitboxSet.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetHitboxSet() Returns entitys current hit box set

Entity:GetHitboxSetCount.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetHitboxSetCount() Returns the amount of hitbox sets in the entity.

Entity:GetInternalVariable.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetInternalVariable() An interface for accessing internal key values on entities.

Entity:GetKeyValues.description: (Server) Method: Entity:GetKeyValues() Returns a table containing all key values the entity has.

Entity:GetLayerCycle.description: (Server) Method: Entity:GetLayerCycle() Returns the animation cycle/frame for given layer.

Entity:GetLayerDuration.description: (Server) Method: Entity:GetLayerDuration() Returns the duration of given layer.

Entity:GetLayerWeight.description: (Server) Method: Entity:GetLayerWeight() Returns the current weight of the layer. See {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetLayerWeight}} for more information.

Entity:GetLocalAngles.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetLocalAngles() Returns the rotation of the entity relative to its parent entity.

Entity:GetLocalAngularVelocity.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetLocalAngularVelocity() Returns the non-VPhysics angular velocity of the entity relative to its parent entity.

Entity:GetLocalPos.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetLocalPos() Returns entity's position relative to it's parent.

Entity:GetManipulateBoneAngles.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetManipulateBoneAngles() Gets the entity's angle manipulation of the given bone. This is relative to the default angle, so the angle is zero when unmodified.

Entity:GetManipulateBonePosition.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetManipulateBonePosition() Gets the entity's position manipulation of the given bone. This is relative to the default position, so it is zero when unmodified.

Entity:GetManipulateBoneScale.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetManipulateBoneScale() Gets the entity's scale manipulation of the given bone. Normal scale is Vector( 1, 1, 1 )

Entity:GetMaterial.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetMaterial() Returns the material override for this entity.

Entity:GetMaterials.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetMaterials() Returns all materials of the entity's model.

Entity:GetMaterialType.description: (Server) Method: Entity:GetMaterialType() Returns the surface material of this entity.

Entity:GetMaxHealth.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetMaxHealth() Returns the max health that the entity was given. It can be set via {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetMaxHealth}}.

Entity:GetModel.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetModel() Gets the model of given entity.

Entity:GetModelBounds.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetModelBounds() Returns the entity's bounding box. Seems to be the same as calling {{ClassFunction|Entity|OBBMins}} and {{ClassFunction|Entity|OBBMaxs}}, however, if the model has been scaled using {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetModelScale}}, it will return the model's original and unmodified mins and maxs.

Entity:GetModelPhysBoneCount.description: (Client) Method: Entity:GetModelPhysBoneCount() Gets the physics bone count of the entity's model.

Entity:GetModelRadius.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetModelRadius() Gets the models radius.

Entity:GetModelScale.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetModelScale() Gets the selected entity's model scale.

Entity:GetMomentaryRotButtonPos.description: (Server) Method: Entity:GetMomentaryRotButtonPos() Returns the amount a momentary_rot_button entity is turned based on the given Angle turnAngle. 0 meaning completely turned closed, 1 meaning completely turned open.

Entity:GetMoveCollide.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetMoveCollide() Returns the move collide type of the entity. The move collide is the way a physics object reacts to hitting an object - will it bounce, slide?

Entity:GetMoveParent.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetMoveParent() Identical to {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetParent}}, there's no distinction between parent and movement parent in the engine.

Entity:GetMoveType.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetMoveType() Returns the entity's movetype

Entity:GetName.description: (Server) Method: Entity:GetName() Returns the mapping name of this entity.

Entity:GetNetworkAngles.description: (Client) Method: Entity:GetNetworkAngles() Gets networked angles for entity.

Entity:GetNetworkedVarProxy.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetNetworkedVarProxy() {{Deprecated|You should be using {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetNWVarProxy}} instead.}}

Entity:GetNetworkedVarTable.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetNetworkedVarTable() {{Deprecated|You should be using {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetNWVarTable}} instead.}}

Entity:GetNetworkOrigin.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetNetworkOrigin() Gets networked origin for entity.

Entity:GetNoDraw.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetNoDraw() Returns if the entity's rendering and transmitting has been disabled.

Entity:GetNumBodyGroups.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetNumBodyGroups() Returns the body group count of the entity.

Entity:GetNumPoseParameters.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetNumPoseParameters() Returns the number of pose parameters this entity has.

Entity:GetNWAngle.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetNWAngle() Retrieves a networked angle value at specified index on the entity that is set by {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetNWAngle}}.

Entity:GetNWBool.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetNWBool() Retrieves a networked boolean value at specified index on the entity that is set by {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetNWBool}}.

Entity:GetNWEntity.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetNWEntity() Retrieves a networked entity value at specified index on the entity that is set by {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetNWEntity}}.

Entity:GetNWFloat.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetNWFloat() Retrieves a networked float value at specified index on the entity that is set by {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetNWFloat}}.

Entity:GetNWInt.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetNWInt() Retrieves a networked integer (whole number) value that was previously set by {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetNWInt}}.

Entity:GetNWString.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetNWString() Retrieves a networked string value at specified index on the entity that is set by {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetNWString}}.

Entity:GetNWVarProxy.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetNWVarProxy() Returns callback function for given NWVar of this entity.

Entity:GetNWVarTable.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetNWVarTable() Returns all the networked variables in an entity.

Entity:GetNWVector.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetNWVector() Retrieves a networked vector value at specified index on the entity that is set by {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetNWVector}}.

Entity:GetOwner.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetOwner() Returns the owner entity of this entity. See {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetOwner}} for more info.

Entity:GetParent.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetParent() Returns the parent entity of this entity.

Entity:GetParentAttachment.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetParentAttachment() Returns the attachment index of the entity's parent. Returns 0 if the entity is not parented to a specific attachment or if it isn't parented at all.

Entity:GetParentPhysNum.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetParentPhysNum() If the entity is parented to an entity that has a model with multiple physics objects (like a ragdoll), this is used to retrieve what physics object number the entity is parented to on it's parent.

Entity:GetPersistent.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetPersistent() Returns whether the entity is persistent or not.

Entity:GetPhysicsAttacker.description: (Server) Method: Entity:GetPhysicsAttacker() Returns player who is claiming kills of physics damage the entity deals.

Entity:GetPhysicsObject.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetPhysicsObject() Returns the entity's physics object, if the entity has physics.

Entity:GetPhysicsObjectCount.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetPhysicsObjectCount() Returns the number of physics objects an entity has (usually 1 for non-ragdolls)

Entity:GetPhysicsObjectNum.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetPhysicsObjectNum() Returns a specific physics object from an entity with multiple (ragdolls)

Entity:GetPlaybackRate.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetPlaybackRate() Returns the playback rate of the main sequence on this entity, with 1.0 being the default speed.

Entity:GetPos.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetPos() Gets the position of entity in world.

Entity:GetPoseParameter.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetPoseParameter() Returns the pose parameter value

Entity:GetPoseParameterName.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetPoseParameterName() Returns name of given pose parameter

Entity:GetPoseParameterRange.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetPoseParameterRange() Returns pose parameter range

Entity:GetPredictable.description: (Client) Method: Entity:GetPredictable() Returns whether this entity is predictable or not.

Entity:GetRagdollOwner.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetRagdollOwner() Returns the entity which the ragdoll came from. The opposite of {{ClassFunction|Player|GetRagdollEntity}}.

Entity:GetRenderAngles.description: (Client) Method: Entity:GetRenderAngles() Returns the entity's render angles, set by {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRenderAngles}} in a drawing hook.

Entity:GetRenderBounds.description: (Client) Method: Entity:GetRenderBounds() Returns render bounds of the entity. Can be overridden by {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRenderBounds}}.

Entity:GetRenderFX.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetRenderFX() Returns current render FX of the entity.

Entity:GetRenderGroup.description: (Client) Method: Entity:GetRenderGroup() Returns the render group of the entity.

Entity:GetRenderMode.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetRenderMode() Returns the render mode of the entity.

Entity:GetRenderOrigin.description: (Client) Method: Entity:GetRenderOrigin() Returns the entity's render origin, set by {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRenderOrigin}} in a drawing hook.

Entity:GetRight.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetRight() Returns the rightward vector of the entity, as a normalized direction vector

Entity:GetRotatedAABB.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetRotatedAABB() Returns the min and max of the entity's axis-aligned bounding box.

Entity:GetSaveTable.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetSaveTable() Returns a table of save values for an entity.

Entity:GetSequence.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetSequence() Return the index of the model sequence that is currently active for the entity.

Entity:GetSequenceActivity.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetSequenceActivity() Return activity id out of sequence id. Opposite of {{ClassFunction|Entity|SelectWeightedSequence}}.

Entity:GetSequenceActivityName.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetSequenceActivityName() Returns the activity name for the given sequence id.

Entity:GetSequenceCount.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetSequenceCount() Returns the amount of sequences ( animations ) the entity's model has.

Entity:GetSequenceGroundSpeed.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetSequenceGroundSpeed() Returns the ground speed of the entity's sequence.

Entity:GetSequenceInfo.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetSequenceInfo() Returns a table of information about an entity's sequence.

Entity:GetSequenceList.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetSequenceList() Returns a list of all sequences ( animations ) the model has.

Entity:GetSequenceMoveDist.description: (Server) Method: Entity:GetSequenceMoveDist() Returns an entity's sequence move distance (the change in position over the course of the entire sequence).

Entity:GetSequenceName.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetSequenceName() Return the name of the sequence for the index provided.

Entity:GetShouldPlayPickupSound.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetShouldPlayPickupSound() Returns true or false depending on whether or not the entity plays a physics contact sound when being picked up by a player.

Entity:GetShouldServerRagdoll.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetShouldServerRagdoll() Returns if entity should create a server ragdoll on death or a client one.

Entity:GetSkin.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetSkin() Returns the skin index of the current skin.

Entity:GetSolid.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetSolid() Returns solid type of an entity.

Entity:GetSolidFlags.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetSolidFlags() Returns solid flag(s) of an entity.

Entity:GetSpawnEffect.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetSpawnEffect() Returns if we should show a spawn effect on this entity.

Entity:GetSpawnFlags.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetSpawnFlags() Returns the bitwise spawn flags used by the entity.

Entity:GetSubMaterial.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetSubMaterial() Returns the material override for the given index.

Entity:GetSubModels.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetSubModels() Returns a list of models included into the entity's model in the .qc file.

Entity:GetTable.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetTable() Returns the table that contains all values saved within the entity.

Entity:GetTouchTrace.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetTouchTrace() Returns the last trace used in the collision callbacks such as {{HookFunction|ENTITY|StartTouch}}, {{HookFunction|ENTITY|Touch}} and {{HookFunction|ENTITY|EndTouch}}.

Entity:GetTransmitWithParent.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetTransmitWithParent() Returns true if the TransmitWithParent flag is set or not.

Entity:GetUnFreezable.description: (Server) Method: Entity:GetUnFreezable() Returns if the entity is unfreezable, meaning it can't be frozen with the physgun. By default props are freezable, so this function will typically return nil.

Entity:GetUp.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetUp() Returns the upward vector of the entity, as a normalized direction vector

Entity:GetVar.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetVar() Retrieves a value from entitys {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetTable}}.

Entity:GetVelocity.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GetVelocity() Returns the directional velocity of the entity.

Entity:GetWorkshopID.description: (Server) Method: Entity:GetWorkshopID() {{Deprecated}}Returns ID of workshop addon that the entity is from.

Entity:GibBreakClient.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GibBreakClient() Causes the entity to break into its current models gibs, if it has any.

Entity:GibBreakServer.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:GibBreakServer() Causes the entity to break into its current models gibs, if it has any.

Entity:HasBoneManipulations.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:HasBoneManipulations() Returns whether or not the entity has a bone which is manipulated using either {{ClassFunction|Entity|ManipulateBonePosition}}, {{ClassFunction|Entity|ManipulateBoneAngles}}, or {{ClassFunction|Entity|ManipulateBoneJiggle}}.

Entity:HasFlexManipulatior.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:HasFlexManipulatior() Returns whether or not the the entity has had flex manipulations performed with {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetFlexWeight}} or {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetFlexScale}}.

Entity:HasSpawnFlags.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:HasSpawnFlags() Returns whether this entity has the specified spawnflags bits set.

Entity:HeadTarget.description: (Server) Method: Entity:HeadTarget() Returns the position of the head of this entity, NPCs use this internally to aim at their targets.

Entity:Health.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:Health() Returns the health of the entity.

Entity:Ignite.description: (Server) Method: Entity:Ignite() Sets the entity on fire.

Entity:InitializeAsClientEntity.description: (Client) Method: Entity:InitializeAsClientEntity() Initializes this entity as being clientside only.

Entity:Input.description: (Server) Method: Entity:Input() Fires input to the entity with the ability to make another entity responsible. Similar to {{ClassFunction|Entity|Fire}}

Entity:InstallDataTable.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:InstallDataTable() {{Internal}} Sets up Data Tables from entity to use with {{ClassFunction|Entity|NetworkVar}}.

Entity:InvalidateBoneCache.description: (Client) Method: Entity:InvalidateBoneCache() Resets the entity's bone cache values in order to prepare for a model change.

Entity:IsConstrained.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:IsConstrained() Returns true if the entity has constraints attached to it

Entity:IsConstraint.description: (Server) Method: Entity:IsConstraint() Returns if entity is constraint or not

Entity:IsDormant.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:IsDormant() Returns whether the entity is dormant or not. Client/server entities become dormant when they leave the PVS on the server. Client side entities can decide for themselves whether to become dormant. This mainly applies to PVS.

Entity:IsEffectActive.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:IsEffectActive() Returns whether an entity has engine effect applied or not.

Entity:IsEFlagSet.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:IsEFlagSet() Checks if given flag is set or not.

Entity:IsFlagSet.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:IsFlagSet() Checks if given flag(s) is set or not.

Entity:IsInWorld.description: (Server) Method: Entity:IsInWorld() Returns whether the entity is inside a wall or outside of the map.

Entity:IsLagCompensated.description: (Server) Method: Entity:IsLagCompensated() Returns whether the entity is lag compensated or not.

Entity:IsLineOfSightClear.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:IsLineOfSightClear() Returns true if the target is in line of sight.

Entity:IsNPC.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:IsNPC() Checks if the entity is an NPC or not.

Entity:IsOnFire.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:IsOnFire() Returns whether the entity is on fire.

Entity:IsOnGround.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:IsOnGround() Returns whether the entity is on ground or not.

Entity:IsPlayer.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:IsPlayer() Checks if the entity is a player or not.

Entity:IsPlayerHolding.description: (Server) Method: Entity:IsPlayerHolding() Returns true if the entity is being held by a player. Either by Physics gun, Gravity gun or Use-key.

Entity:IsPlayingGesture.description: (Server) Method: Entity:IsPlayingGesture() Returns whether there's a gesture is given activity being played.

Entity:IsRagdoll.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:IsRagdoll() Checks if the entity is a ragdoll.

Entity:IsSolid.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:IsSolid() Returns if the entity is solid or not.

Entity:IsValid.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:IsValid() Returns whether the entity is a valid entity or not.

Entity:IsValidLayer.description: (Server) Method: Entity:IsValidLayer() Returns whether the given layer ID is valid and exists on this entity.

Entity:IsVehicle.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:IsVehicle() Checks if the entity is a vehicle or not.

Entity:IsWeapon.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:IsWeapon() Checks if the entity is a weapon or not.

Entity:IsWidget.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:IsWidget() Returns whether the entity is a widget or not.

Entity:IsWorld.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:IsWorld() Returns if the entity is the map's Entity[0] worldspawn

Entity:LocalToWorld.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:LocalToWorld() Converts a vector local to an entity into a worldspace vector

Entity:LocalToWorldAngles.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:LocalToWorldAngles() Converts a local angle (local to the entity) to a world angle.

Entity:LookupAttachment.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:LookupAttachment() Gets the attachment index of the given attachment name, returns 0 if the attachment does not exist.

Entity:LookupBone.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:LookupBone() Gets the bone index of the given bone name, returns nothing if the bone does not exist.

Entity:LookupSequence.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:LookupSequence() Returns sequence ID from its name.

Entity:MakePhysicsObjectAShadow.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:MakePhysicsObjectAShadow() Turns the {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetPhysicsObject}} into a physics shadow.

Entity:ManipulateBoneAngles.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:ManipulateBoneAngles() Sets custom bone angles.

Entity:ManipulateBoneJiggle.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:ManipulateBoneJiggle() Manipulates the bone's jiggle value(s).

Entity:ManipulateBonePosition.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:ManipulateBonePosition() Sets custom bone offsets.

Entity:ManipulateBoneScale.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:ManipulateBoneScale() Sets custom bone scale.

Entity:MapCreationID.description: (Server) Method: Entity:MapCreationID() Returns entity's map creation ID. Unlike {{ClassFunction|Entity|EntIndex}} or {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetCreationID}}, it will always be the same on same map, no matter how much you clean up or restart it.

Entity:MarkShadowAsDirty.description: (Client) Method: Entity:MarkShadowAsDirty() Refreshes the shadow of the entity.

Entity:MuzzleFlash.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:MuzzleFlash() Fires the muzzle flash effect of the weapon the entity is carrying. This only creates a light effect and is often called alongside {{ClassFunction|Weapon|SendWeaponAnim}}

Entity:NearestPoint.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:NearestPoint() Performs a Ray OBBox intersection from the given position to the origin of the OBBox with the entity and returns the hit position on the OBBox

Entity:NetworkVar.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:NetworkVar() Creates a network variable on the entity and adds Set/Get functions for it. This function should only be called in {{HookFunction|ENTITY|SetupDataTables}}.

Entity:NetworkVarNotify.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:NetworkVarNotify() Creates a callback that will execute when the given network variable changes - that is, when the Set<name> function is run.

Entity:NextThink.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:NextThink() In the case of a scripted entity, this will cause the next {{HookFunction|ENTITY|Think}} event to be run at the given time.

Entity:OBBCenter.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:OBBCenter() Returns the center of an entity's bounding box as a local vector.

Entity:OBBMaxs.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:OBBMaxs() Returns the highest corner of an entity's bounding box as a local vector.

Entity:OBBMins.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:OBBMins() Returns the lowest corner of an entity's bounding box as a local vector.

Entity:ObjectCaps.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:ObjectCaps() Returns the entity's capabilities as a bitfield.

Entity:OnGround.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:OnGround() Returns true if the entity is on the ground, and false if it isn't.

Entity:PassesDamageFilter.description: (Server) Method: Entity:PassesDamageFilter() Tests whether the damage passes the entity filter.

Entity:PassesFilter.description: (Server) Method: Entity:PassesFilter() Tests whether the entity passes the entity filter.

Entity:PhysicsDestroy.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:PhysicsDestroy() Destroys the current physics object of an entity.

Entity:PhysicsFromMesh.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:PhysicsFromMesh() Initializes the physics mesh of the entity from a triangle soup defined by a table of vertices. The resulting mesh is hollow, may contain holes, and always has a volume of 0.

Entity:PhysicsInit.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:PhysicsInit() Initializes the physics object of the entity using its current model. Deletes the previous physics object if there was any.

Entity:PhysicsInitBox.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:PhysicsInitBox() Makes the physics object of the entity a AABB.

Entity:PhysicsInitConvex.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:PhysicsInitConvex() Initializes the physics mesh of the entity with a convex mesh defined by a table of points. The resulting mesh is the [[wikipedia:Convex hull|convex hull]] of all the input points.

Entity:PhysicsInitMultiConvex.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:PhysicsInitMultiConvex() An advanced version of {{ClassFunction|Entity|PhysicsInitConvex}} which initializes a physics object from multiple convex meshes.

Entity:PhysicsInitShadow.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:PhysicsInitShadow() Removes the old {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetPhysicsObject}} and initializes it as a physics shadow.

Entity:PhysicsInitSphere.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:PhysicsInitSphere() Makes the physics object of the entity a sphere.

Entity:PhysWake.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:PhysWake() Wakes up the entity's physics object

Entity:PlayScene.description: (Server) Method: Entity:PlayScene() Makes the entity play a .vcd scene.

Entity:PointAtEntity.description: (Server) Method: Entity:PointAtEntity() Changes an entities angles so that it faces the target entity.

Entity:PrecacheGibs.description: (Server) Method: Entity:PrecacheGibs() Precaches gibs for the entity. This is required for {{ClassFunction|Entity|GibBreakServer}} and {{ClassFunction|Entity|GibBreakClient}} to work.

Entity:RagdollSolve.description: (Server) Method: Entity:RagdollSolve() Normalizes the ragdoll. This is used alongside Kinect in {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRagdollBuildFunction}}, for more info see ragdoll_motion entity.

Entity:RagdollStopControlling.description: (Server) Method: Entity:RagdollStopControlling() Sets the function to build the ragdoll. This is used alongside Kinect in {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRagdollBuildFunction}}, for more info see ragdoll_motion entity.

Entity:RagdollUpdatePhysics.description: (Server) Method: Entity:RagdollUpdatePhysics() Makes the physics objects follow the set bone positions. This is used alongside Kinect in {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRagdollBuildFunction}}, for more info see ragdoll_motion entity.

Entity:Remove.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:Remove() Removes the entity it is used on.

Entity:RemoveAllDecals.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:RemoveAllDecals() Removes all decals from the entities surface.

Entity:RemoveAllGestures.description: (Server) Method: Entity:RemoveAllGestures() Removes and stops all gestures.

Entity:RemoveCallOnRemove.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:RemoveCallOnRemove() Removes the CallOnRemove'd function referred to by identifier

Entity:RemoveEffects.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:RemoveEffects() Removes an engine effect applied to an entity.

Entity:RemoveEFlags.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:RemoveEFlags() Removes specified engine flag

Entity:RemoveFlags.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:RemoveFlags() Removes specified flag(s) from the entity

Entity:RemoveFromMotionController.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:RemoveFromMotionController() Removes a PhysObj}}ect from the entity's motion controller so that {{HookFunction|ENTITY|PhysicsSimulate}} will no longer be called for given {{Type|PhysObject.

Entity:RemoveGesture.description: (Server) Method: Entity:RemoveGesture() Removes and stop the gesture with given activity.

Entity:RemoveSolidFlags.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:RemoveSolidFlags() Removes solid flag(s) from the entity.

Entity:ResetSequence.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:ResetSequence() Plays an animations on the entity. This may not always work on engine entities.

Entity:ResetSequenceInfo.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:ResetSequenceInfo() Reset entity sequence info such as playback rate, ground speed, last event check, etc.

Entity:Respawn.description: (Server) Method: Entity:Respawn() Makes the entity/weapon respawn.

Entity:RestartGesture.description: (Server) Method: Entity:RestartGesture() Restarts the entity's animation gesture. If the given gesture is already playing, it will reset it and play it from the beginning.

Entity:SelectWeightedSequence.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SelectWeightedSequence() Returns sequence ID corresponding to given activity id. Opposite of {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetSequenceActivity}}. Similar to {{ClassFunction|Entity|LookupSequence}}

Entity:SendViewModelMatchingSequence.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SendViewModelMatchingSequence() Sends sequence animation to the view model. It is recommended to use this for view model animations, instead of {{ClassFunction|Entity|ResetSequence}}.

Entity:SequenceDuration.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SequenceDuration() Returns length of currently played sequence.

Entity:SetAbsVelocity.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetAbsVelocity() Sets the entity's velocity.

Entity:SetAngles.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetAngles() Sets the angles of the entity.

Entity:SetAnimation.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetAnimation() Sets a player's third-person animation. Mainly used by Weapons to start the player's weapon attack and reload animations.

Entity:SetAnimTime.description: (Client) Method: Entity:SetAnimTime() Sets the time (relative to {{GlobalFunction|CurTime}}) of the current animation frame, which is used to determine {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetCycle}}.

Entity:SetAttachment.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetAttachment() {{Deprecated|You should be using {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetParent}} instead.}}

Entity:SetBloodColor.description: (Server) Method: Entity:SetBloodColor() Sets the blood color this entity uses.

Entity:SetBodygroup.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetBodygroup() Sets an entities' bodygroup.

Entity:SetBodyGroups.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetBodyGroups() Sets the bodygroups from a string. A convenience function for {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetBodygroup}}.

Entity:SetBoneController.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetBoneController() Sets the specified value on the bone controller with the given ID of this entity, it's used in HL1 to change the head rotation of NPCs, turret aiming and so on.

Entity:SetBonePosition.description: (Client) Method: Entity:SetBonePosition() Sets the bone position and angles.

Entity:SetCollisionBounds.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetCollisionBounds() Sets the collision bounds for the entity, which are used for triggers ( {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetTrigger}}, {{HookFunction|ENTITY|Touch}} ), determining if rendering is necessary clientside, and collision ( If {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetSolid}} set as [[Enums/SOLID|SOLID_BBOX]] ).

Entity:SetCollisionBoundsWS.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetCollisionBoundsWS() Sets the collision bounds for the entity, which are used for triggers ( {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetTrigger}}, {{HookFunction|ENTITY|Touch}} ), determining if rendering is necessary clientside, and collision ( If {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetSolid}} set as [[Enums/SOLID|SOLID_BBOX]] ).

Entity:SetCollisionGroup.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetCollisionGroup() Sets the entity's collision group.

Entity:SetColor.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetColor() Sets the color of an entity.

Entity:SetCreator.description: (Server) Method: Entity:SetCreator() Sets the creator of the SENT.

Entity:SetCustomCollisionCheck.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetCustomCollisionCheck() Marks the entity to call {{HookFunction|GM|ShouldCollide}}.

Entity:SetCycle.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetCycle() Sets the progress of the current animation to a specific value between 0 and 1.

Entity:SetElasticity.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetElasticity() Sets the elasticity of this entity, used by some flying entities such as the Helicopter NPC to determine how much it should bounce around when colliding.

Entity:SetEntity.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetEntity() Allows you to set the Start or End entity attachment for the rope.

Entity:SetEyeTarget.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetEyeTarget() Sets the position an entity's eyes look toward.

Entity:SetFlexScale.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetFlexScale() Sets the flex scale of the entity.

Entity:SetFlexWeight.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetFlexWeight() Sets the flex weight.

Entity:SetFriction.description: (Server) Method: Entity:SetFriction() Sets how much friction an entity has when sliding against a surface. Entities default to 1 (100%) and can be higher or even negative.

Entity:SetGravity.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetGravity() Sets the gravity multiplier of the entity.

Entity:SetGroundEntity.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetGroundEntity() Sets the ground the entity is standing on.

Entity:SetHealth.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetHealth() Sets the health of the entity.

Entity:SetIK.description: (Client) Method: Entity:SetIK() Enables or disable the inverse kinematic usage of this entity.

Entity:SetKeyValue.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetKeyValue() Sets key value for the entity.

Entity:SetLagCompensated.description: (Server) Method: Entity:SetLagCompensated() This allows the entity to be lag compensated during {{ClassFunction|Player|LagCompensation}}.

Entity:SetLayerCycle.description: (Server) Method: Entity:SetLayerCycle() Sets the animation cycle/frame of given layer.

Entity:SetLayerDuration.description: (Server) Method: Entity:SetLayerDuration() Sets the duration of given layer. This internally overrides the {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetLayerPlaybackRate}}.

Entity:SetLayerLooping.description: (Server) Method: Entity:SetLayerLooping() Sets whether the layer should loop or not.

Entity:SetLayerPlaybackRate.description: (Server) Method: Entity:SetLayerPlaybackRate() Sets the layer player back rate. See also {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetLayerDuration}}.

Entity:SetLayerPriority.description: (Server) Method: Entity:SetLayerPriority() Sets the priority of given layer.

Entity:SetLayerWeight.description: (Server) Method: Entity:SetLayerWeight() Sets the layer weight. This influences how strongly the animation should be overriding the normal animations of the entity.

Entity:SetLegacyTransform.description: (Client) Method: Entity:SetLegacyTransform() This forces an entity to use the bone transformation behaviour from versions prior to '''14.07.08'''.

Entity:SetLocalAngles.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetLocalAngles() Sets angles relative to angles of {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetParent}}

Entity:SetLocalPos.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetLocalPos() Sets local position relative to the parented position. This is for use with {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetParent}} to offset position.

Entity:SetLocalVelocity.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetLocalVelocity() Sets the entity's local velocity. Same as {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetAbsVelocity}}, but clamps given velocity, and is not recommended to be used because of that.

Entity:SetLOD.description: (Client) Method: Entity:SetLOD() Sets the Level Of Detail model to use with this entity. This may not work for all models if the model doesn't include any LOD sub models.

Entity:SetMaterial.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetMaterial() Sets the rendering material override of the entity.

Entity:SetMaxHealth.description: (Server) Method: Entity:SetMaxHealth() Sets the maximum health for entity. Note, that you can still set entity's health above this amount with {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetHealth}}.

Entity:SetModel.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetModel() Sets the model of the entity.

Entity:SetModelName.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetModelName() Alter the model name returned by {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetModel}}. Does not affect the entity's actual model.

Entity:SetModelScale.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetModelScale() Scales the model of the entity, if the entity is a Player}} or an {{Type|NPC the hitboxes will be scaled as well.

Entity:SetMoveCollide.description: (Server) Method: Entity:SetMoveCollide() Sets the move collide type of the entity. The move collide is the way a physics object reacts to hitting an object - will it bounce, slide?

Entity:SetMoveParent.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetMoveParent() Sets the Movement Parent of an entity to another entity. Similar to {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetParent}}, except the object's coordinates are not translated automatically before parenting.

Entity:SetMoveType.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetMoveType() Sets the entitys movetype.

Entity:SetName.description: (Server) Method: Entity:SetName() Sets the mapping name of the entity.

Entity:SetNetworkAngles.description: (Client) Method: Entity:SetNetworkAngles() Alters networked entity angles.

Entity:SetNetworkedNumber.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetNetworkedNumber() Sets a networked number at the specified index on the entity.

Entity:SetNetworkedVarProxy.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetNetworkedVarProxy() {{Deprecated|You should be using {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetNWVarProxy}} instead.}}

Entity:SetNetworkOrigin.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetNetworkOrigin() Virtually changes entity position for clients.

Entity:SetNextClientThink.description: (Client) Method: Entity:SetNextClientThink() Sets the next time the clientside {{HookFunction|ENTITY|Think}} is called.

Entity:SetNoDraw.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetNoDraw() Sets if the entity's model should render at all

Entity:SetNotSolid.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetNotSolid() Sets whether the entity is solid or not.

Entity:SetNWAngle.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetNWAngle() Sets a networked angle value on the entity.

Entity:SetNWBool.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetNWBool() Sets a networked boolean value on the entity.

Entity:SetNWEntity.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetNWEntity() Sets a networked entity value on the entity.

Entity:SetNWFloat.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetNWFloat() Sets a networked float (number) value on the entity.

Entity:SetNWInt.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetNWInt() Sets a networked integer (whole number) value on the entity.

Entity:SetNWString.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetNWString() Sets a networked string value on the entity.

Entity:SetNWVarProxy.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetNWVarProxy() Sets a function to be called when the NWVar changes.

Entity:SetNWVector.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetNWVector() Sets a networked vector value on the entity.

Entity:SetOwner.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetOwner() Sets the owner of this entity, disabling all physics interaction with it.

Entity:SetParent.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetParent() Sets the parent of this entity, making it move with its parent.

Entity:SetParentPhysNum.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetParentPhysNum() Sets the parent of an entity to another entity with the given physics bone number. Similar to {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetParent}}, except it is parented to a physbone. This function is useful mainly for ragdolls.

Entity:SetPersistent.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetPersistent() Sets whether or not the given entity is persistent. A persistent entity will be saved on server shutdown and loaded back when the server starts up. Additionally, by default persistent entities cannot be grabbed with the physgun and tools cannot be used on them.

Entity:SetPhysConstraintObjects.description: (Server) Method: Entity:SetPhysConstraintObjects() When called on a constraint entity, sets the two physics objects to be constrained.

Entity:SetPhysicsAttacker.description: (Server) Method: Entity:SetPhysicsAttacker() Sets the player who gets credit if this entity kills something with physics damage within the time limit.

Entity:SetPlaybackRate.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetPlaybackRate() Allows you to set how fast an entity's animation will play, with 1.0 being the default speed.
