Entity:SetPos.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetPos() Moves the entity to the specified position.

Entity:SetPoseParameter.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetPoseParameter() Sets the specified pose parameter to the specified value.

Entity:SetPredictable.description: (Client) Method: Entity:SetPredictable() Sets whether an entity should be predictable or not.

Entity:SetPreventTransmit.description: (Server) Method: Entity:SetPreventTransmit() Prevents the server from sending any further information about the entity to a player.

Entity:SetRagdollAng.description: (Server) Method: Entity:SetRagdollAng() Sets the bone angles. This is used alongside Kinect in {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRagdollBuildFunction}}, for more info see ragdoll_motion entity.

Entity:SetRagdollBuildFunction.description: (Server) Method: Entity:SetRagdollBuildFunction() Sets the function to build the ragdoll. This is used alongside Kinect, for more info see ragdoll_motion entity.

Entity:SetRagdollPos.description: (Server) Method: Entity:SetRagdollPos() Sets the bone position. This is used alongside Kinect in {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRagdollBuildFunction}}, for more info see ragdoll_motion entity.

Entity:SetRenderAngles.description: (Client) Method: Entity:SetRenderAngles() Sets the render angles of the Entity.

Entity:SetRenderBounds.description: (Client) Method: Entity:SetRenderBounds() Sets the render bounds for the entity. For world space coordinates see {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRenderBoundsWS}}.

Entity:SetRenderBoundsWS.description: (Client) Method: Entity:SetRenderBoundsWS() Sets the render bounds for the entity in world space coordinates. For relative coordinates see {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRenderBounds}}.

Entity:SetRenderClipPlane.description: (Client) Method: Entity:SetRenderClipPlane() Used to specify a plane, past which an object will be visually clipped.

Entity:SetRenderClipPlaneEnabled.description: (Client) Method: Entity:SetRenderClipPlaneEnabled() Enables the use of clipping planes to "cut" objects.

Entity:SetRenderFX.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetRenderFX() Sets entity's render FX.

Entity:SetRenderMode.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetRenderMode() Sets the render mode of the entity.

Entity:SetRenderOrigin.description: (Client) Method: Entity:SetRenderOrigin() Set the origin in which the Entity will be drawn from.

Entity:SetSaveValue.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetSaveValue() Sets a save value for an entity.

Entity:SetSequence.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetSequence() Sets the entity's model sequence. If the specified sequence is already active, the animation will not be restarted. See also {{ClassFunction|Entity|ResetSequence}}.

Entity:SetShouldPlayPickupSound.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetShouldPlayPickupSound() Sets whether or not the entity should make a physics contact sound when it's been picked up by a player.

Entity:SetShouldServerRagdoll.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetShouldServerRagdoll() Sets if entity should create a server ragdoll on death or a client one.

Entity:SetSkin.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetSkin() Sets the skin of the entity.

Entity:SetSolid.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetSolid() Sets the solidity of an entity.

Entity:SetSolidFlags.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetSolidFlags() Sets solid flag(s) for the entity.

Entity:SetSpawnEffect.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetSpawnEffect() Sets whether the entity should use a spawn effect. See also: {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetSpawnEffect}}

Entity:SetSubMaterial.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetSubMaterial() Overrides a single material on the model of this entity.

Entity:SetTable.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetTable() Changes the table that can be accessed by indexing an entity. Each entity starts with its own table by default.

Entity:SetTransmitWithParent.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetTransmitWithParent() When this flag is set the entity will only transmit to the player when its parent is transmitted. This is useful for things like viewmodel attachments since without this flag they will transmit to everyone (and cause the viewmodels to transmit to everyone too).

Entity:SetTrigger.description: (Server) Method: Entity:SetTrigger() Marks the entity as a trigger, so it will generate {{HookFunction|ENTITY|StartTouch}}, {{HookFunction|ENTITY|Touch}} and {{HookFunction|ENTITY|EndTouch}} callbacks

Entity:SetUnFreezable.description: (Server) Method: Entity:SetUnFreezable() Sets whether an entity can be unfrozen, meaning that it cannot be unfrozen using the physgun.

Entity:SetupBones.description: (Client) Method: Entity:SetupBones() Forces the entity to reconfigure its bones. You might need to call this after changing your model's scales or when manually drawing the entity multiple times at different positions.

Entity:SetupPhonemeMappings.description: (Client) Method: Entity:SetupPhonemeMappings() Initializes the class names of an entity's phoneme mappings (mouth movement data). This is called by default with argument "phonemes" when a flex-based entity (such as an NPC) is created.

Entity:SetUseType.description: (Server) Method: Entity:SetUseType() Sets the use type of an entity, affecting how often {{HookFunction|ENTITY|Use}} will be called for Lua entities.

Entity:SetVar.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetVar() Allows to quickly set variable to entitys {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetTable}}.

Entity:SetVelocity.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetVelocity() Sets an entity's velocity with a given vector velocity.

Entity:SetWeaponModel.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SetWeaponModel() Sets the model and associated weapon to this viewmodel entity.

Entity:SkinCount.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:SkinCount() Returns the amount of skins the entity has.

Entity:SnatchModelInstance.description: (Client) Method: Entity:SnatchModelInstance() Moves the model instance from the source entity to this entity. This can be used to transfer decals that have been applied on one entity to another.

Entity:Spawn.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:Spawn() Initializes the entity and starts its networking.

Entity:StartLoopingSound.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:StartLoopingSound() The function seems to be broken.

Entity:StartMotionController.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:StartMotionController() Starts a motion controller in the physics engine tied to this entity's PhysObj}}, which enables the use of {{HookFunction|ENTITY|PhysicsSimulate.

Entity:StopAndDestroyParticles.description: (Client) Method: Entity:StopAndDestroyParticles() Stops all particle effects parented to the entity and immediately destroys them.

Entity:StopLoopingSound.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:StopLoopingSound() The function seems to be broken.

Entity:StopMotionController.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:StopMotionController() Stops the motion controller created with {{ClassFunction|Entity|StartMotionController}}.

Entity:StopParticleEmission.description: (Client) Method: Entity:StopParticleEmission() Stops all particle effects parented to the entity.

Entity:StopParticles.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:StopParticles() Stops any attached to the entity .pcf particles using {{GlobalFunction|ParticleEffectAttach}}.

Entity:StopParticlesNamed.description: (Client) Method: Entity:StopParticlesNamed() Stops all particle effects parented to the entity with given name.

Entity:StopParticlesWithNameAndAttachmen.description: (Client) Method: Entity:StopParticlesWithNameAndAttachment() Stops all particle effects parented to the entity with given name on given attachment.

Entity:StopSound.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:StopSound() Stops emitting the given sound from the entity.

Entity:TakeDamage.description: (Server) Method: Entity:TakeDamage() Applies the specified amount of damage to the entity.

Entity:TakeDamageInfo.description: (Server) Method: Entity:TakeDamageInfo() Applies the damage specified by the damage info to the entity.

Entity:TakePhysicsDamage.description: (Server) Method: Entity:TakePhysicsDamage() Applies physics damage to the entity

Entity:TestPVS.description: (Server) Method: Entity:TestPVS() Check if the given position or entity is within this entity's PVS.

Entity:TranslateBoneToPhysBone.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:TranslateBoneToPhysBone() Gets the phys bone for a bone

Entity:TranslatePhysBoneToBone.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:TranslatePhysBoneToBone() Gets the bone number corresponding to a physics bone.

Entity:Use.description: (Server) Method: Entity:Use() Activates the entity, as if a player pressed the Use key (Default {{Key|E}}) on it.

Entity:UseTriggerBounds.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:UseTriggerBounds() Enables or disables trigger bounds.

Entity:ViewModelIndex.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:ViewModelIndex() Returns the index of this view model, it can be used to identify which one of the player's view models this entity is.

Entity:Visible.description: (Server) Method: Entity:Visible() Returns true if the provided entity is visible from the passed entity.

Entity:VisibleVec.description: (Server) Method: Entity:VisibleVec() Returns true if supplied vector is visible from the entity's line of sight.

Entity:WaterLevel.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:WaterLevel() Returns an integer that represents how deep in water the entity is.

Entity:Weapon_TranslateActivity.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:Weapon_TranslateActivity() Calls and returns {{HookFunction|WEAPON|TranslateActivity}} on the weapon the entity ( player or NPC ) carries.

Entity:WorldSpaceAABB.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:WorldSpaceAABB() Returns two vectors representing the minimum and maximum extent of the entity's bounding box.

Entity:WorldSpaceCenter.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:WorldSpaceCenter() Returns the center of the entity according to its collision model.

Entity:WorldToLocal.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:WorldToLocal() Converts a worldspace vector into a vector local to an entity

Entity:WorldToLocalAngles.description: (Shared) Method: Entity:WorldToLocalAngles() Converts world angles to local angles ( local to the entity )

File:Close.description: (Shared) Method: File:Close() Dumps the file changes to disk and closes the file handle which makes the handle useless.

File:Flush.description: (Shared) Method: File:Flush() Dumps the file changes to disk and saves the file.

File:Read.description: (Shared) Method: File:Read() Reads the specified amount of chars and returns them as a binary string.

File:ReadBool.description: (Shared) Method: File:ReadBool() Reads one byte of the file and returns whether that byte was not 0.

File:ReadByte.description: (Shared) Method: File:ReadByte() Reads one unsigned 8-bit integer from the file.

File:ReadDouble.description: (Shared) Method: File:ReadDouble() Reads 8 bytes from the file converts them to a double and returns them.

File:ReadFloat.description: (Shared) Method: File:ReadFloat() Reads 4 bytes from the file converts them to a float and returns them.

File:ReadLine.description: (Shared) Method: File:ReadLine() Returns the contents of the file from the current position up until the end of the current line. This function will not return more than 8192 characters.

File:ReadLong.description: (Shared) Method: File:ReadLong() Reads a signed 32 bit integer from the file.

File:ReadShort.description: (Shared) Method: File:ReadShort() Reads a signed 16-bit integer from the file.

File:Seek.description: (Shared) Method: File:Seek() Sets the file pointer to the specified position.

File:Size.description: (Shared) Method: File:Size() Returns the size of the file in bytes.

File:Skip.description: (Shared) Method: File:Skip() Moves the file pointer by the specified amount of chars.

File:Tell.description: (Shared) Method: File:Tell() Returns the current position of the file pointer.

File:Write.description: (Shared) Method: File:Write() Writes the given string into the file.

File:WriteBool.description: (Shared) Method: File:WriteBool() Writes on byte, representing the a Boolean to the file.

File:WriteByte.description: (Shared) Method: File:WriteByte() Write an 8-bit unsigned integer to the file.

File:WriteDouble.description: (Shared) Method: File:WriteDouble() Writes a 8byte floating point double to the file.

File:WriteFloat.description: (Shared) Method: File:WriteFloat() Writes a 4byte float to the file.

File:WriteLong.description: (Shared) Method: File:WriteLong() Writes a 32-bit signed integer to the file.

File:WriteShort.description: (Shared) Method: File:WriteShort() Writes a 16-bit signed integer to the file.

IGModAudioChannel:EnableLooping.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:EnableLooping() Enables or disables looping of audio channel, requires noblock flag.

IGModAudioChannel:FFT.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:FFT() Computes the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Discrete_Fourier_transform DFT (discrete Fourier transform)] of the sound channel.

IGModAudioChannel:Get3DCone.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:Get3DCone() Returns 3D cone of the sound channel. See {{ClassFunction|IGModAudioChannel|Set3DCone}}.

IGModAudioChannel:Get3DFadeDistance.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:Get3DFadeDistance() Returns 3D fade distances of a sound channel.

IGModAudioChannel:GetBitsPerSample.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:GetBitsPerSample() Retrieves the number of bits per sample of the sound channel.

IGModAudioChannel:GetFileName.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:GetFileName() Returns the filename for the sound channel.

IGModAudioChannel:GetLength.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:GetLength() Returns the length of sound played by the sound channel.

IGModAudioChannel:GetLevel.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:GetLevel() Returns the right and left levels of sound played by the sound channel.

IGModAudioChannel:GetPlaybackRate.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:GetPlaybackRate() Returns the playback rate of the sound channel.

IGModAudioChannel:GetPos.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:GetPos() Returns position of the sound channel

IGModAudioChannel:GetSamplingRate.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:GetSamplingRate() Returns the sample rate for currently playing sound.

IGModAudioChannel:GetState.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:GetState() Returns the state of a sound channel

IGModAudioChannel:GetTime.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:GetTime() Returns the current time of the sound channel

IGModAudioChannel:GetVolume.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:GetVolume() Returns volume of a sound channel

IGModAudioChannel:Is3D.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:Is3D() Returns if the sound channel is in 3D mode or not.

IGModAudioChannel:IsBlockStreamed.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:IsBlockStreamed() Returns whether the audio stream is block streamed or not.

IGModAudioChannel:IsLooping.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:IsLooping() Returns if the sound channel is looping or not.

IGModAudioChannel:IsOnline.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:IsOnline() Returns if the sound channel is streamed from the Internet or not.

IGModAudioChannel:IsValid.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:IsValid() Returns if the sound channel is valid or not.

IGModAudioChannel:Pause.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:Pause() Pauses the stream. It can be started again using {{ClassFunction|IGModAudioChannel|Play}}

IGModAudioChannel:Play.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:Play() Starts playing the stream.

IGModAudioChannel:Set3DCone.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:Set3DCone() Sets 3D cone of the sound channel.

IGModAudioChannel:Set3DFadeDistance.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:Set3DFadeDistance() Sets 3D fade distances of a sound channel.

IGModAudioChannel:SetPlaybackRate.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:SetPlaybackRate() Sets the playback rate of the sound channel. May not work with high values for radio streams.

IGModAudioChannel:SetPos.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:SetPos() Sets position of sound channel in case the sound channel has a 3d option set.

IGModAudioChannel:SetTime.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:SetTime() Sets the sound channel to specified time ( Rewind to that position of the song ). Does not work on online radio streams.

IGModAudioChannel:SetVolume.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:SetVolume() Sets the volume of a sound channel

IGModAudioChannel:Stop.description: (Client) Method: IGModAudioChannel:Stop() {{Warning|This is currently broken and causes the object to become invalid. It will not play again. [https://github.com/Facepunch/garrysmod-issues/issues/1497 Issue #1497]}}

IMaterial:GetColor.description: (Shared) Method: IMaterial:GetColor() Returns the color of the specified pixel of the $basetexture, only works for materials created from PNG files.

IMaterial:GetFloat.description: (Shared) Method: IMaterial:GetFloat() Returns the specified material value as a float, or nil if the value is not set.

IMaterial:GetInt.description: (Shared) Method: IMaterial:GetInt() Returns the specified material value as a int, rounds the value if its a float, or nil if the value is not set.

IMaterial:GetKeyValues.description: (Shared) Method: IMaterial:GetKeyValues() Gets all the key values defined for the material.

IMaterial:GetMatrix.description: (Shared) Method: IMaterial:GetMatrix() Returns the specified material matrix as a int, or nil if the value is not set or is not a matrix.

IMaterial:GetName.description: (Shared) Method: IMaterial:GetName() Returns the name of the material, in most cases the path.

IMaterial:GetShader.description: (Shared) Method: IMaterial:GetShader() Returns the name of the materials shader.

IMaterial:GetString.description: (Shared) Method: IMaterial:GetString() Returns the specified material string, or nil if the value is not set or if the value can not be converted to a string.

IMaterial:GetTexture.description: (Shared) Method: IMaterial:GetTexture() Returns an ITexture based on the passed shader parameter.

IMaterial:GetVector.description: (Shared) Method: IMaterial:GetVector() Returns the specified material linear color vector, or nil if the value is not set.

IMaterial:Height.description: (Shared) Method: IMaterial:Height() Returns the height of the member texture set for $basetexture.

IMaterial:IsError.description: (Shared) Method: IMaterial:IsError() Returns whenever the material was not loaded successfully.

IMaterial:Recompute.description: (Shared) Method: IMaterial:Recompute() Recomputes the material's snapshot. This needs to be called if you have changed variables on your material and it isn't changing.

IMaterial:SetFloat.description: (Shared) Method: IMaterial:SetFloat() Sets the specified material float to the specified float, does nothing on a type mismatch.

IMaterial:SetInt.description: (Shared) Method: IMaterial:SetInt() Sets the specified material value to the specified int, does nothing on a type mismatch.

IMaterial:SetMatrix.description: (Shared) Method: IMaterial:SetMatrix() Sets the specified material value to the specified matrix, does nothing on a type mismatch.

IMaterial:SetShader.description: (Shared) Method: IMaterial:SetShader() {{Deprecated|This function does nothing}}The functionality of this function was removed due to the amount of crashes it caused.

IMaterial:SetString.description: (Shared) Method: IMaterial:SetString() Sets the specified material value to the specified string, does nothing on a type mismatch.

IMaterial:SetTexture.description: (Shared) Method: IMaterial:SetTexture() Sets the specified material texture to the specified texture, does nothing on a type mismatch.

IMaterial:SetUndefined.description: (Shared) Method: IMaterial:SetUndefined() Unsets the value for the specified material value.

IMaterial:SetVector.description: (Shared) Method: IMaterial:SetVector() Sets the specified material vector to the specified vector, does nothing on a type mismatch.

IMaterial:Width.description: (Shared) Method: IMaterial:Width() Returns the width of the member texture set for $basetexture.

IMesh:BuildFromTriangles.description: (Client) Method: IMesh:BuildFromTriangles() Builds the mesh from a table mesh vertexes.

IMesh:Destroy.description: (Client) Method: IMesh:Destroy() Deletes the mesh and frees the memory used by it..

IMesh:Draw.description: (Client) Method: IMesh:Draw() Renders the mesh with the active matrix.

IRestore:EndBlock.description: (Shared) Method: IRestore:EndBlock() Ends current data block started with {{ClassFunction|IRestore|StartBlock}} and returns to the parent block.

IRestore:ReadAngle.description: (Shared) Method: IRestore:ReadAngle() Reads next bytes from the restore object as an Angle.

IRestore:ReadBool.description: (Shared) Method: IRestore:ReadBool() Reads next bytes from the restore object as a boolean.

IRestore:ReadEntity.description: (Shared) Method: IRestore:ReadEntity() Reads next bytes from the restore object as an Entity.

IRestore:ReadFloat.description: (Shared) Method: IRestore:ReadFloat() Reads next bytes from the restore object as a floating point number.

IRestore:ReadInt.description: (Shared) Method: IRestore:ReadInt() Reads next bytes from the restore object as an integer number.

IRestore:ReadString.description: (Shared) Method: IRestore:ReadString() Reads next bytes from the restore object as a string.

IRestore:ReadVector.description: (Shared) Method: IRestore:ReadVector() Reads next bytes from the restore object as a Vector.

IRestore:StartBlock.description: (Shared) Method: IRestore:StartBlock() Loads next block of data to be read inside current block. Blocks '''must''' be ended with {{ClassFunction|IRestore|EndBlock}}.

ISave:EndBlock.description: (Shared) Method: ISave:EndBlock() Ends current data block started with {{ClassFunction|ISave|StartBlock}} and returns to the parent block.

ISave:StartBlock.description: (Shared) Method: ISave:StartBlock() Starts a new block of data that you can write to inside current block. Blocks '''must''' be ended with {{ClassFunction|ISave|EndBlock}}.

ISave:WriteAngle.description: (Shared) Method: ISave:WriteAngle() Writes an Angle to the save object.

ISave:WriteBool.description: (Shared) Method: ISave:WriteBool() Writes a boolean to the save object.

ISave:WriteEntity.description: (Shared) Method: ISave:WriteEntity() Writes an Entity to the save object.

ISave:WriteFloat.description: (Shared) Method: ISave:WriteFloat() Writes a floating point number to the save object.

ISave:WriteInt.description: (Shared) Method: ISave:WriteInt() Writes an integer number to the save object.

ISave:WriteString.description: (Shared) Method: ISave:WriteString() Writes a string to the save object.

ISave:WriteVector.description: (Shared) Method: ISave:WriteVector() Writes a Vector to the save object.

ITexture:Download.description: (Shared) Method: ITexture:Download() Invokes the generator of the texture. Reloads file based textures from disk and clears render target textures.

ITexture:GetColor.description: (Shared) Method: ITexture:GetColor() Returns the color of the specified pixel, only works for textures created from PNG files.

ITexture:GetMappingHeight.description: (Shared) Method: ITexture:GetMappingHeight() Returns the true unmodified height of the texture.

ITexture:GetMappingWidth.description: (Shared) Method: ITexture:GetMappingWidth() Returns the true unmodified width of the texture.

ITexture:GetName.description: (Shared) Method: ITexture:GetName() Returns the name of the texture, in most cases the path.

ITexture:Height.description: (Shared) Method: ITexture:Height() Returns the modified height of the texture, this value may be affected by mipmapping and other factors.

ITexture:IsError.description: (Shared) Method: ITexture:IsError() Returns whenever the texture is invalid or not.

ITexture:Width.description: (Shared) Method: ITexture:Width() Returns the modified width of the texture, this value may be affected by mipmapping and other factors.

IVideoWriter:AddFrame.description: (Client) Method: IVideoWriter:AddFrame() Adds the current framebuffer to the video stream.

IVideoWriter:Finish.description: (Client) Method: IVideoWriter:Finish() Ends the video recording and dumps it to disk.

IVideoWriter:Height.description: (Client) Method: IVideoWriter:Height() Returns the height of the video stream.

IVideoWriter:SetRecordSound.description: (Client) Method: IVideoWriter:SetRecordSound() Sets whether to record sound or not.

IVideoWriter:Width.description: (Client) Method: IVideoWriter:Width() Returns the width of the video stream.

MarkupObject:Draw.body: Draw(${1:number xOffset}, ${2:number yOffset}, ${3:number xAlign}, ${4:number yAlign}, ${5:number alphaoverride=255})$0
MarkupObject:Draw.description: (Client) Method: MarkupObject:Draw() Draws the computed markupobject to the screen.

MarkupObject:GetHeight.description: (Client) Method: MarkupObject:GetHeight() Gets computed the height of the markupobject.

MarkupObject:GetWidth.description: (Client) Method: MarkupObject:GetWidth() Gets computed the width of the markupobject.

MarkupObject:Size.description: (Client) Method: MarkupObject:Size() Gets computed the width and height of the markupobject.

NextBot:BecomeRagdoll.description: (Server) Method: NextBot:BecomeRagdoll() Become a ragdoll and remove the entity.

NextBot:BodyMoveXY.description: (Server) Method: NextBot:BodyMoveXY() Should only be called in BodyUpdate. This sets the move_x and move_y pose parameters of the bot to fit how they're currently moving, sets the animation speed to suit the ground speed and calls FrameAdvance.

NextBot:FindSpot.description: (Server) Method: NextBot:FindSpot() Like {{ClassFunction|NextBot|FindSpots}} but only returns a vector.

NextBot:FindSpots.description: (Server) Method: NextBot:FindSpots() Returns a table of hiding spots.

NextBot:GetActivity.description: (Server) Method: NextBot:GetActivity() Returns the currently running activity

NextBot:GetRangeSquaredTo.description: (Server) Method: NextBot:GetRangeSquaredTo() Returns the distance to an entity or position. It is supposed to return a squared distance, however.

NextBot:GetRangeTo.description: (Server) Method: NextBot:GetRangeTo() Returns the distance to an entity or position

NextBot:GetSolidMask.description: (Server) Method: NextBot:GetSolidMask() Returns the solid mask for given NextBot.

NextBot:HandleStuck.description: (Server) Method: NextBot:HandleStuck() Called from Lua when the NPC is stuck. This should only be called from the behaviour coroutine - so if you want to override this function and do something special that yields - then go for it.

NextBot:MoveToPos.description: (Server) Method: NextBot:MoveToPos() To be called in the behaviour coroutine only! Will yield until the bot has reached the goal or is stuck

NextBot:PlaySequenceAndWait.description: (Server) Method: NextBot:PlaySequenceAndWait() To be called in the behaviour coroutine only! Plays an animation sequence and waits for it to end before returning.

NextBot:SetSolidMask.description: (Server) Method: NextBot:SetSolidMask() Sets the solid mask for given NextBot.

NextBot:StartActivity.description: (Server) Method: NextBot:StartActivity() Start doing an activity (animation)

NPC:AddEntityRelationship.description: (Server) Method: NPC:AddEntityRelationship() Makes the NPC like, hate, feel neutral towards, or fear the entity in question. If you want to setup relationship towards a certain entity ''class'', use {{ClassFunction|NPC|AddRelationship}}.

NPC:AddRelationship.description: (Server) Method: NPC:AddRelationship() Changes how an NPC feels towards another NPC.  If you want to setup relationship towards a certain ''entity'', use {{ClassFunction|NPC|AddEntityRelationship}}.

NPC:AlertSound.description: (Server) Method: NPC:AlertSound() Force an NPC to play his Alert sound.

NPC:CapabilitiesAdd.description: (Server) Method: NPC:CapabilitiesAdd() Adds a capability to the NPC.

NPC:CapabilitiesClear.description: (Server) Method: NPC:CapabilitiesClear() Removes all of Capabilities the NPC has.

NPC:CapabilitiesGet.description: (Server) Method: NPC:CapabilitiesGet() Returns the NPC's capabilities along the ones defined on its weapon.

NPC:CapabilitiesRemove.description: (Server) Method: NPC:CapabilitiesRemove() Remove a certain capability.

NPC:Classify.description: (Server) Method: NPC:Classify() Returns the NPC class. Do not confuse with {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetClass}}!

NPC:ClearCondition.description: (Server) Method: NPC:ClearCondition() Clears out the specified {{Enum|COND}} on this NPC.

NPC:ClearEnemyMemory.description: (Server) Method: NPC:ClearEnemyMemory() Clears the Enemy from the NPC's memory, effectively forgetting it until met again with either the NPC vision or with {{ClassFunction|NPC|UpdateEnemyMemory}}.

NPC:ClearExpression.description: (Server) Method: NPC:ClearExpression() Clears the NPC's current expression which can be set with {{ClassFunction|NPC|SetExpression}}.

NPC:ClearSchedule.description: (Server) Method: NPC:ClearSchedule() Stops the current schedule that the NPC is doing.

NPC:ConditionName.description: (Server) Method: NPC:ConditionName() Translates condition ID to a string.

NPC:Disposition.description: (Server) Method: NPC:Disposition() Returns the way the NPC "feels" about the entity.

NPC:ExitScriptedSequence.description: (Server) Method: NPC:ExitScriptedSequence() Makes an NPC exit a scripted sequence, if one is playing.

NPC:FearSound.description: (Server) Method: NPC:FearSound() Force an NPC to play his Fear sound.

NPC:FoundEnemySound.description: (Server) Method: NPC:FoundEnemySound() Force an NPC to play its FoundEnemy sound.

NPC:GetActiveWeapon.description: (Shared) Method: NPC:GetActiveWeapon() Returns the weapon the NPC is currently carrying, or [http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global_Variables NULL].

NPC:GetActivity.description: (Server) Method: NPC:GetActivity() Returns the NPC's current activity.

NPC:GetAimVector.description: (Server) Method: NPC:GetAimVector() Returns the aim vector of the NPC. NPC alternative of {{ClassFunction|Player|GetAimVector}}.

NPC:GetArrivalActivity.description: (Server) Method: NPC:GetArrivalActivity() Returns the activity to be played when the NPC arrives at its goal

NPC:GetCurrentWeaponProficiency.description: (Server) Method: NPC:GetCurrentWeaponProficiency() Returns how proficient (skilled) an NPC is with its current weapon.

NPC:GetEnemy.description: (Server) Method: NPC:GetEnemy() Returns the entity that this NPC is trying to fight

NPC:GetExpression.description: (Server) Method: NPC:GetExpression() Returns the expression file the NPC is currently playing.

NPC:GetHullType.description: (Server) Method: NPC:GetHullType() Returns NPCs hull type set by {{ClassFunction|NPC|SetHullType}}.

NPC:GetMovementActivity.description: (Server) Method: NPC:GetMovementActivity() Returns the NPC's current movement activity.

NPC:GetMovementSequence.description: (Server) Method: NPC:GetMovementSequence() Returns the index of the sequence the NPC uses to move.

NPC:GetNPCState.description: (Server) Method: NPC:GetNPCState() Returns the NPC's state.

NPC:GetShootPos.description: (Server) Method: NPC:GetShootPos() Returns the shooting position of the NPC.

NPC:Give.description: (Server) Method: NPC:Give() Used to give a weapon to an already spawned NPC.

NPC:HasCondition.description: (Server) Method: NPC:HasCondition() Returns whether or not the NPC has the given condition.

NPC:IdleSound.description: (Server) Method: NPC:IdleSound() Force an NPC to play his Idle sound.

NPC:IsCurrentSchedule.description: (Server) Method: NPC:IsCurrentSchedule() Returns whether or not the NPC is performing the given schedule.

NPC:IsMoving.description: (Server) Method: NPC:IsMoving() Returns whether the NPC is moving or not.

NPC:IsUnreachable.description: (Server) Method: NPC:IsUnreachable() Returns whether the entity given can be reached by this NPC.

NPC:LostEnemySound.description: (Server) Method: NPC:LostEnemySound() Force an NPC to play his LostEnemy sound.

NPC:MarkEnemyAsEluded.description: (Server) Method: NPC:MarkEnemyAsEluded() Causes the NPC to temporarily forget the current enemy and switch on to a better one.

NPC:NavSetGoalTarget.description: (Server) Method: NPC:NavSetGoalTarget() Set the goal target for an NPC.

NPC:NavSetWanderGoal.description: (Server) Method: NPC:NavSetWanderGoal() Sets a goal in x, y offsets for the npc to wander to

NPC:PlaySentence.description: (Server) Method: NPC:PlaySentence() Forces the NPC to play a sentence from scripts/sentences.txt

NPC:SetCondition.description: (Server) Method: NPC:SetCondition() Sets an NPC condition.

NPC:SetCurrentWeaponProficiency.description: (Server) Method: NPC:SetCurrentWeaponProficiency() Sets the weapon proficiency of an NPC (how skilled an NPC is with its current weapon).

NPC:SetEnemy.description: (Server) Method: NPC:SetEnemy() Sets the target for an NPC.

NPC:SetExpression.description: (Server) Method: NPC:SetExpression() Sets the NPC's .vcd expression. Similar to {{ClassFunction|Entity|PlayScene}} except the scene is looped until it's interrupted by default NPC behavior or {{ClassFunction|NPC|ClearExpression}}.

NPC:SetHullSizeNormal.description: (Server) Method: NPC:SetHullSizeNormal() Updates the NPC's hull and physics hull in order to match its model scale. {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetModelScale}} seems to take care of this regardless.

NPC:SetHullType.description: (Server) Method: NPC:SetHullType() Sets the hull type for the NPC.

NPC:SetLastPosition.description: (Server) Method: NPC:SetLastPosition() Sets the last registered or memorized position for an npc. When using scheduling, the NPC will focus on navigating to the last position via nodes.

NPC:SetMovementActivity.description: (Server) Method: NPC:SetMovementActivity() Sets the activity the NPC uses when it moves.

NPC:SetMovementSequence.description: (Server) Method: NPC:SetMovementSequence() Sets the sequence the NPC navigation path uses for speed calculation. Doesn't seem to have any visible effect on NPC movement.

NPC:SetNPCState.description: (Server) Method: NPC:SetNPCState() Sets the state the NPC is in to help it decide on a ideal schedule.

NPC:SetSchedule.description: (Server) Method: NPC:SetSchedule() Sets the NPC's current schedule.

NPC:SetTarget.description: (Server) Method: NPC:SetTarget() Sets the NPC's target to a player.(Used in some engine schedules)

NPC:StartEngineTask.description: (Server) Method: NPC:StartEngineTask() Forces the NPC to start an engine task, this has different results for every NPC.

NPC:StopMoving.description: (Server) Method: NPC:StopMoving() Resets the NPC's movement animation and velocity. Does not actually stop the NPC from moving.

NPC:UpdateEnemyMemory.description: (Server) Method: NPC:UpdateEnemyMemory() Force the NPC to update information on the supplied enemy, as if it had line of sight to it.

Panel:Add.description: (Client) Method: Panel:Add() Adds the specified object to the panel.

Panel:AlignBottom.description: (Client) Method: Panel:AlignBottom() Aligns the panel on the bottom of its parent with the specified offset.

Panel:AlignLeft.description: (Client) Method: Panel:AlignLeft() Aligns the panel on the left of its parent with the specified offset.

Panel:AlignRight.description: (Client) Method: Panel:AlignRight() Aligns the panel on the right of its parent with the specified offset.

Panel:AlignTop.description: (Client) Method: Panel:AlignTop() Aligns the panel on the top of its parent with the specified offset.

Panel:AlphaTo.description: (Client) Method: Panel:AlphaTo() Uses animation to transition the current alpha value of a panel to a new alpha, over a set period of time and after a specified delay.

Panel:AnimationThinkInternal.description: (Client) Method: Panel:AnimationThinkInternal() {{Internal}} Performs the per-frame operations required for panel animations.

Panel:AnimTail.description: (Client) Method: Panel:AnimTail() Returns the {{GlobalFunction|SysTime}} value when all animations for this panel object will end.

Panel:AppendText.description: (Client) Method: Panel:AppendText() Appends text to a RichText element. This does not automatically add a new line.

Panel:ApplyGWEN.description: (Client) Method: Panel:ApplyGWEN() Used by {{ClassFunction|Panel|LoadGWENFile}} and {{ClassFunction|Panel|LoadGWENString}} to apply a GWEN controls table to a panel object.

Panel:Center.description: (Client) Method: Panel:Center() Centers the panel on its parent.

Panel:CenterHorizontal.description: (Client) Method: Panel:CenterHorizontal() Centers the panel horizontally with specified fraction.

Panel:CenterVertical.description: (Client) Method: Panel:CenterVertical() Centers the panel vertically with specified fraction.

Panel:ChildCount.description: (Client) Method: Panel:ChildCount() Returns the amount of children of the of panel.

Panel:ChildrenSize.description: (Client) Method: Panel:ChildrenSize() Returns the width and height of the space between the position of the panel (upper-left corner) and the max bound of the children panels (farthest reaching lower-right corner).

Panel:Clear.description: (Client) Method: Panel:Clear() Marks all of the panel's children for deletion.

Panel:ColorTo.description: (Client) Method: Panel:ColorTo() Fades panels color to specified one. It won't work unless panel has SetColor function.

Panel:Command.description: (Client) Method: Panel:Command() Sends an action command signal to the panel. The response is handled by {{HookFunction|PANEL|ActionSignal}}.

Panel:ConVarChanged.description: (Client) Method: Panel:ConVarChanged() Updates a panel object's associated console variable. This must first be set up with {{GlobalFunction|Derma_Install_Convar_Functions}}, and have a ConVar set using {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetConVar}}.

Panel:ConVarNumberThink.description: (Client) Method: Panel:ConVarNumberThink() A think hook for [[Panel|panels]] using ConVars as a value. Call it in the Think hook. Sets the panel's value should the convar change.

Panel:ConVarStringThink.description: (Client) Method: Panel:ConVarStringThink() A think hook for [[Panel|panels]] using ConVars as a value. Call it in the Think hook. Sets the panel's value should the convar change.

Panel:CopyBase.description: (Client) Method: Panel:CopyBase() Gets the size, position and dock state of the passed panel object, and applies it to this one.

Panel:CopyBounds.description: (Client) Method: Panel:CopyBounds() Copies position and size of the panel.

Panel:CopyHeight.description: (Client) Method: Panel:CopyHeight() Copies the height of the panel.

Panel:CopyPos.description: (Client) Method: Panel:CopyPos() Copies the position of the panel.

Panel:CopySelected.description: (Client) Method: Panel:CopySelected() Performs the "CONTROL + C" key combination effect ( Copy selection to clipboard ) on selected text.

Panel:CopyWidth.description: (Client) Method: Panel:CopyWidth() Copies the width of the panel.

Panel:CursorPos.description: (Client) Method: Panel:CursorPos() Returns the cursor position relative to the top left of the panel.

Panel:CutSelected.description: (Client) Method: Panel:CutSelected() Performs the "CONTROL + X" ( delete text and copy it to clipboard buffer ) action on selected text.

Panel:DeleteCookie.description: (Client) Method: Panel:DeleteCookie() Deletes a cookie value using the panel's cookie name ( {{ClassFunction|Panel|GetCookieName}} ) and the passed extension.

Panel:DisableLerp.description: (Client) Method: Panel:DisableLerp() Resets the panel object's {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetPos}} method and removes its animation table (''Panel.LerpAnim''). This effectively undoes the changes made by {{ClassFunction|Panel|LerpPositions}}.

Panel:Distance.description: (Client) Method: Panel:Distance() Returns the linear distance from the centre of this panel object and another.

Panel:DistanceFrom.description: (Client) Method: Panel:DistanceFrom() Returns the distance between the centre of this panel object and a specified point (local to the parent panel).

Panel:Dock.description: (Client) Method: Panel:Dock() Sets the dock type of the panel.

Panel:DockMargin.description: (Client) Method: Panel:DockMargin() Sets the dock margin of the panel.

Panel:DockPadding.description: (Client) Method: Panel:DockPadding() Sets the dock padding of the panel.

Panel:DoModal.description: (Client) Method: Panel:DoModal() Makes the panel "lock" the screen until it is removed.

Panel:DragClick.description: (Client) Method: Panel:DragClick() {{Internal}} Called by {{ClassFunction|Panel|DragMouseRelease}} when a user clicks one mouse button whilst dragging with another.

Panel:DragHover.description: (Client) Method: Panel:DragHover() {{Internal}} Called by {{LibraryFunction|dragndrop|HoverThink}} to perform actions on an object that is dragged and hovered over another.

Panel:DragHoverClick.description: (Client) Method: Panel:DragHoverClick() Called when an object is dragged and hovered over this panel for 0.1 seconds. This is used by DPropertySheet}} and {{Type|DTree, for example to expand the tree when an object is hovered over it.

Panel:DragHoverEnd.description: (Client) Method: Panel:DragHoverEnd() {{Internal}} Called to end a drag and hover action. This resets the panel's {{HookFunction|PANEL|PaintOver}} method, and is primarily used by {{LibraryFunction|dragndrop|StopDragging}}.

Panel:DragMousePress.description: (Client) Method: Panel:DragMousePress() Called to inform the {{Lib|dragndrop}} that a mouse button is being held down on a panel object.

Panel:DragMouseRelease.description: (Client) Method: Panel:DragMouseRelease() Called to inform the {{Lib|dragndrop}} that a mouse button has been depressed on a panel object.

Panel:DrawDragHover.description: (Client) Method: Panel:DrawDragHover() {{Internal}} Called to draw the drop target when an object is being dragged across another. See {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetDropTarget}}.

Panel:DrawFilledRect.description: (Client) Method: Panel:DrawFilledRect() Draws a coloured rectangle to fill the panel object this method is called on. The colour is set using {{LibraryFunction|surface|SetDrawColor}}. This should only be called within the object's {{HookFunction|PANEL|Paint}} or {{HookFunction|PANEL|PaintOver}} hooks, as a shortcut for {{LibraryFunction|surface|DrawRect}}.

Panel:DrawOutlinedRect.description: (Client) Method: Panel:DrawOutlinedRect() Draws a hollow rectangle the size of the panel object this method is called on, with a border width of 1 px. The border colour is set using {{LibraryFunction|surface|SetDrawColor}}. This should only be called within the object's {{HookFunction|PANEL|Paint}} or {{HookFunction|PANEL|PaintOver}} hooks, as a shortcut for {{LibraryFunction|surface|DrawOutlinedRect}}.

Panel:DrawSelections.description: (Client) Method: Panel:DrawSelections() Used to draw the magenta highlight colour of a panel object when it is selected. This should be called in the object's {{HookFunction|PANEL|PaintOver}} hook. Once this is implemented, the highlight colour will be displayed only when the object is selectable and selected. This is achieved using {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetSelectable}} and {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetSelected}} respectively.

Panel:DrawTextEntryText.description: (Client) Method: Panel:DrawTextEntryText() Used to draw the text in a DTextEntry}} within a derma skin. This should be called within the {{HookFunction|SKIN|PaintTextEntry skin hook.

Panel:DrawTexturedRect.description: (Client) Method: Panel:DrawTexturedRect() Draws a textured rectangle to fill the panel object this method is called on. The texture is set using {{LibraryFunction|surface|SetTexture}} or {{LibraryFunction|surface|SetMaterial}}. This should only be called within the object's {{HookFunction|PANEL|Paint}} or {{HookFunction|PANEL|PaintOver}} hooks, as a shortcut for {{LibraryFunction|surface|DrawTexturedRect}}.

Panel:Droppable.description: (Client) Method: Panel:Droppable() Makes this panel dropable. This is used with {{ClassFunction|Panel|Receiver}} to create drag and drop events.

Panel:DroppedOn.description: (Client) Method: Panel:DroppedOn() For override. Called when this panel is dropped onto other panel.

Panel:EndBoxSelection.description: (Client) Method: Panel:EndBoxSelection() Completes a box selection. If the end point of the selection box is within the selection canvas, mouse capture is disabled for the panel object, and the selected state of each child object within the selection box is toggled.

Panel:Exec.description: (Client) Method: Panel:Exec() {{Internal}} Used to run commands within a DHTML window.

Panel:Find.description: (Client) Method: Panel:Find() Finds a panel in its children(and sub children) with the given name.

Panel:FocusNext.description: (Client) Method: Panel:FocusNext() Focuses the next panel in the focus queue.

Panel:FocusPrevious.description: (Client) Method: Panel:FocusPrevious() Focuses the previous panel in the focus queue.

Panel:GetAlpha.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetAlpha() Returns the alpha multiplier for this panel.

Panel:GetBounds.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetBounds() Returns the position and size of the panel.

Panel:GetCaretPos.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetCaretPos() Returns the position/offset of the caret (or text cursor) in a text-based panel object.

Panel:GetChild.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetChild() Gets a child by its index.

Panel:GetChildPosition.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetChildPosition() Gets a child object's position relative to this panel object. The number of levels is not relevant; the child may have many parents between itself and the object on which the method is called.

Panel:GetChildren.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetChildren() Returns a table with all the child panels of the panel.

Panel:GetChildrenInRect.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetChildrenInRect() Returns a table of all visible, selectable children of the panel object that lie at least partially within the specified rectangle.

Panel:GetClassName.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetClassName() Returns the class name of the panel.

Panel:GetClosestChild.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetClosestChild() Returns the child of this panel object that is closest to the specified point. The point is relative to the object on which the method is called. The distance the child is from this point is also returned.

Panel:GetContentSize.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetContentSize() Gets the size of the content/children within a panel object.

Panel:GetCookie.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetCookie() Gets the value of a cookie stored by the panel object. This can also be done with {{LibraryFunction|cookie|GetString}}, using the panel's cookie name, a fullstop, and then the actual name of the cookie.

Panel:GetCookieName.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetCookieName() Gets the name the panel uses to store cookies. This is set with {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetCookieName}}.

Panel:GetCookieNumber.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetCookieNumber() Gets the value of a cookie stored by the panel object, as a number. This can also be done with {{LibraryFunction|cookie|GetNumber}}, using the panel's cookie name, a fullstop, and then the actual name of the cookie.

Panel:GetDock.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetDock() Returns a dock enum for the panel's current docking type.

Panel:GetDockMargin.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetDockMargin() Returns the docked margins of the panel. (set by {{ClassFunction|Panel|DockMargin}})

Panel:GetDockPadding.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetDockPadding() Returns the docked padding of the panel. (set by {{ClassFunction|Panel|DockPadding}})

Panel:GetFont.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetFont() Returns the name of the font that the panel renders its text with.

Panel:GetHTMLMaterial.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetHTMLMaterial() Returns the panel's HTML material. Only works with Awesomium}}, {{Type|HTML}} and {{Type|DHTML panels that have been fully loaded.

Panel:GetName.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetName() Returns the internal name of the panel.

Panel:GetNumLines.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetNumLines() Returns the number of lines in a RichText}}. You must wait a couple frames before calling this after using {{ClassFunction|Panel|AppendText}} or {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetText, otherwise it will return the number of text lines before the text change.

Panel:GetParent.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetParent() Returns the parent of the panel, returns nil if there is no parent.

Panel:GetPos.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetPos() Returns the position of the panel relative to its {{ClassFunction|Panel|GetParent}}.

Panel:GetSelectedChildren.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetSelectedChildren() Returns a table of all children of the panel object that are selected. This is recursive, and the returned table will include tables for any child objects that also have children. This means that not all first-level members in the returned table will be of type Panel.

Panel:GetSelectionCanvas.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetSelectionCanvas() Returns the panel object (''self'') if it has been enabled as a selection canvas. This is achieved using {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetSelectionCanvas}}.

Panel:GetSize.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetSize() Returns the size of the panel.

Panel:GetSkin.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetSkin() Returns the table for the derma skin currently being used by this panel object.

Panel:GetTable.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetTable() Returns the internal Lua table of the panel.

Panel:GetTall.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetTall() Returns the height of the panel.

Panel:GetText.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetText() Returns the panel's text (where applicable).

Panel:GetTextInset.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetTextInset() Gets the left and top text margins of a text-based panel object, such as a DButton}} or {{Type|DLabel}}. This is set with {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetTextInset.

Panel:GetTextSize.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetTextSize() Gets the size of the text within a Label derived panel.

Panel:GetValidReceiverSlot.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetValidReceiverSlot() Gets valid receiver slot of currently dragged panel.

Panel:GetValue.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetValue() Returns the value the panel holds.

Panel:GetWide.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetWide() Returns the width of the panel.

Panel:GetZPos.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GetZPos() Returns the Z position of the panel.

Panel:GoBack.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GoBack() Goes back one page in the HTML panel's history if available.

Panel:GoForward.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GoForward() Goes forward one page in the HTML panel's history if available.

Panel:GoToHistoryOffset.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GoToHistoryOffset() Goes to the page in the HTML panel's history at the specified relative offset.

Panel:GotoTextEnd.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GotoTextEnd() Causes a RichText element to scroll to the bottom of its text.

Panel:GotoTextStart.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GotoTextStart() Causes a RichText element to scroll to the top of its text.

Panel:GWEN_SetCheckboxText.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GWEN_SetCheckboxText() {{Internal}} Used by {{ClassFunction|Panel|ApplyGWEN}} to apply the ''CheckboxText'' property to a DCheckBoxLabel}}. This does exactly the same as {{ClassFunction|Panel|GWEN_SetText, but exists to cater for the seperate GWEN properties.

Panel:GWEN_SetControlName.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GWEN_SetControlName() {{Internal}} Used by {{ClassFunction|Panel|ApplyGWEN}} to apply the ''ControlName'' property to a panel. This calls {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetName}}.

Panel:GWEN_SetDock.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GWEN_SetDock() {{Internal}} Used by {{ClassFunction|Panel|ApplyGWEN}} to apply the ''Dock'' property to a  panel object. This calls {{ClassFunction|Panel|Dock}}.

Panel:GWEN_SetHorizontalAlign.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GWEN_SetHorizontalAlign() {{Internal}} Used by {{ClassFunction|Panel|ApplyGWEN}} to apply the ''HorizontalAlign'' property to a  panel object. This calls {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetContentAlignment}}.

Panel:GWEN_SetMargin.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GWEN_SetMargin() {{Internal}} Used by {{ClassFunction|Panel|ApplyGWEN}} to apply the ''Margin'' property to a  panel object. This calls {{ClassFunction|Panel|DockMargin}}.

Panel:GWEN_SetMax.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GWEN_SetMax() {{Internal}} Used by {{ClassFunction|Panel|ApplyGWEN}} to apply the ''Max'' property to a DNumberWang}}, {{Type|Slider}}, {{Type|DNumSlider}} or {{Type|DNumberScratch. This calls ''SetMax'' on one of the previously listed methods.

Panel:GWEN_SetMin.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GWEN_SetMin() {{Internal}} Used by {{ClassFunction|Panel|ApplyGWEN}} to apply the ''Min'' property to a DNumberWang}}, {{Type|Slider}}, {{Type|DNumSlider}} or {{Type|DNumberScratch. This calls ''SetMin'' on one of the previously listed methods.

Panel:GWEN_SetPosition.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GWEN_SetPosition() {{Internal}} Used by {{ClassFunction|Panel|ApplyGWEN}} to apply the ''Position'' property to a  panel object. This calls {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetPos}}.

Panel:GWEN_SetSize.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GWEN_SetSize() {{Internal}} Used by {{ClassFunction|Panel|ApplyGWEN}} to apply the ''Size'' property to a  panel object. This calls {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetSize}}.

Panel:GWEN_SetText.description: (Client) Method: Panel:GWEN_SetText() {{Internal}} Used by {{ClassFunction|Panel|ApplyGWEN}} to apply the ''Text'' property to a panel.

Panel:HasChildren.description: (Client) Method: Panel:HasChildren() Returns whenever the panel has child panels.

Panel:HasFocus.description: (Client) Method: Panel:HasFocus() Returns if the panel is focused.

Panel:HasHierarchicalFocus.description: (Client) Method: Panel:HasHierarchicalFocus() Returns if the panel or any of its children(sub children and so on) has the focus.

Panel:HasParent.description: (Client) Method: Panel:HasParent() Returns whether the panel is a descendent of the given panel.

Panel:Hide.description: (Client) Method: Panel:Hide() Makes a panel invisible.

Panel:InsertClickableTextEnd.description: (Client) Method: Panel:InsertClickableTextEnd() Marks the end of a clickable text segment in a RichText}} element, started with {{ClassFunction|Panel|InsertClickableTextStart.

Panel:InsertClickableTextStart.description: (Client) Method: Panel:InsertClickableTextStart() Starts the insertion of clickable text for a RichText}} element. Any text appended with {{ClassFunction|Panel|AppendText}} between this call and {{ClassFunction|Panel|InsertClickableTextEnd will become clickable text.

Panel:InsertColorChange.description: (Client) Method: Panel:InsertColorChange() Inserts a color change in a RichText}} element, which affects the color of all text added with {{ClassFunction|Panel|AppendText until another color change is applied.

Panel:InsertFade.description: (Client) Method: Panel:InsertFade() Begins a text fade for a RichText element where the last appended text segment is fully faded out after a specific amount of time, at a specific speed.

Panel:InvalidateChildren.description: (Client) Method: Panel:InvalidateChildren() Invalidates the layout of this panel object and all its children. This will cause these objects to re-layout immediately, calling {{HookFunction|PANEL|PerformLayout}}. If you want to perform the layout in the next frame, you will have loop manually through all children, and call {{ClassFunction|Panel|InvalidateLayout}} on each.

Panel:InvalidateLayout.description: (Client) Method: Panel:InvalidateLayout() Causes the panel to re-layout in the next frame. During the layout process  {{HookFunction|PANEL|PerformLayout}} will be called on the target panel.

Panel:InvalidateParent.description: (Client) Method: Panel:InvalidateParent() Invalidates the layout of the parent of this panel object. This will cause it to re-layout, calling {{HookFunction|PANEL|PerformLayout}}.

Panel:IsChildHovered.description: (Client) Method: Panel:IsChildHovered() Determines whether the mouse cursor is hovered over one of this panel object's children. This is a reverse process using {{LibraryFunction|vgui|GetHoveredPanel}}, and looks upward to find the parent.

Panel:IsDraggable.description: (Client) Method: Panel:IsDraggable() Returns whether this panel is draggable ( if user is able to drag it ) or not.

Panel:IsDragging.description: (Client) Method: Panel:IsDragging() Returns whether this panel is currently being dragger or not.

Panel:IsEnabled.description: (Client) Method: Panel:IsEnabled() Returns whether the the panel is enabled or disabled.

Panel:IsHovered.description: (Client) Method: Panel:IsHovered() Returns whether the mouse cursor is hovering over this panel or not

Panel:IsKeyboardInputEnabled.description: (Client) Method: Panel:IsKeyboardInputEnabled() Returns true if the panel can receive keyboard input.

Panel:IsLoading.description: (Client) Method: Panel:IsLoading() Determines whether or not a HTML}} or {{Type|DHTML element is currently loading a page.

Panel:IsMarkedForDeletion.description: (Client) Method: Panel:IsMarkedForDeletion() Returns if the panel is going to be deleted in the next frame.

Panel:IsMouseInputEnabled.description: (Client) Method: Panel:IsMouseInputEnabled() Returns true if the panel can receive mouse input.

Panel:IsMultiline.description: (Client) Method: Panel:IsMultiline() Determines whether or not a text-based panel object, such as a DTextEntry}}, is in multi-line mode. This is set with {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetMultiline.

Panel:IsOurChild.description: (Client) Method: Panel:IsOurChild() Returns whether the panel contains the given panel, recursively.

Panel:IsSelectable.description: (Client) Method: Panel:IsSelectable() Determines if the panel object is selectable (like icons in the Spawn Menu, holding {{Key|Shift}}). This is set with {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetSelectable}}.

Panel:IsSelected.description: (Client) Method: Panel:IsSelected() Returns if the panel object is selected (like icons in the Spawn Menu, holding {{Key|Shift}}). This can be set in Lua using {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetSelected}}.

Panel:IsSelectionCanvas.description: (Client) Method: Panel:IsSelectionCanvas() Determines if the panel object is a selection canvas or not. This is set with {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetSelectionCanvas}}.

Panel:IsValid.description: (Client) Method: Panel:IsValid() Returns if the panel is valid and not marked for deletion.

Panel:IsVisible.description: (Client) Method: Panel:IsVisible() Returns if the panel is visible.

Panel:KillFocus.description: (Client) Method: Panel:KillFocus() Remove the focus from the panel.

Panel:LerpPositions.description: (Client) Method: Panel:LerpPositions() Redefines the panel object's {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetPos}} method to operate using frame-by-frame linear interpolation (Lerp). When the panel's position is changed, it will move to the target position at the speed defined. You can undo this with {{ClassFunction|Panel|DisableLerp}}.

Panel:LoadGWENFile.description: (Client) Method: Panel:LoadGWENFile() Loads a .gwen file (created by GWEN Designer) and calls {{ClassFunction|Panel|LoadGWENString}} with the contents of the loaded file.

Panel:LoadGWENString.description: (Client) Method: Panel:LoadGWENString() Loads controls for the panel from a JSON string.

Panel:LocalCursorPos.description: (Client) Method: Panel:LocalCursorPos() Returns the cursor position local to the position of the panel (usually the upper-left corner).

Panel:LocalToScreen.description: (Client) Method: Panel:LocalToScreen() Gets the absolute screen position of the position specified relative to the panel.

Panel:MakePopup.description: (Client) Method: Panel:MakePopup() Focuses the panel and enables it to receive input.

Panel:MouseCapture.description: (Client) Method: Panel:MouseCapture() Allows the panel to receive mouse input even if the mouse cursor is outside the bounds of the panel.

Panel:MoveAbove.description: (Client) Method: Panel:MoveAbove() Places the panel above the passed panel with the specified offset.

Panel:MoveBelow.description: (Client) Method: Panel:MoveBelow() Places the panel below the passed panel with the specified offset.

Panel:MoveBy.body: MoveBy(${1:number moveX}, ${2:number moveY}, ${3:number time}, ${4:number delay=0}, ${5:number ease=-1}, ${6:function callback})$0
Panel:MoveBy.description: (Client) Method: Panel:MoveBy() Moves the panel by the specified coordinates using animation.

Panel:MoveLeftOf.description: (Client) Method: Panel:MoveLeftOf() Places the panel left to the passed panel with the specified offset.

Panel:MoveRightOf.description: (Client) Method: Panel:MoveRightOf() Places the panel right to the passed panel with the specified offset.

Panel:MoveTo.body: MoveTo(${1:number posX}, ${2:number posY}, ${3:number time}, ${4:number delay=0}, ${5:number ease=-1}, ${6:function callback})$0
Panel:MoveTo.description: (Client) Method: Panel:MoveTo() Moves the panel to the specified position using animation.

Panel:MoveToAfter.description: (Client) Method: Panel:MoveToAfter() Moves this panel object in front of the specified sibling (child of the same parent) in the render order, and shuffles up the Z-positions of siblings now behind.

Panel:MoveToBack.description: (Client) Method: Panel:MoveToBack() Moves the panel object behind all other panels on screen. If the panel has been made a pop-up with {{ClassFunction|Panel|MakePopup}}, it will still draw in front of any panels that haven't.

Panel:MoveToBefore.description: (Client) Method: Panel:MoveToBefore() Moves this panel object behind the specified sibling (child of the same parent) in the render order, and shuffles up the Z-positions of siblings now in front.

Panel:MoveToFront.description: (Client) Method: Panel:MoveToFront() Moves the panel in front of all other panels on screen. Unless the panel has been made a pop-up using {{ClassFunction|Panel|MakePopup}}, it will still draw behind any that have.

Panel:NewAnimation.description: (Client) Method: Panel:NewAnimation() Creates a new animation for the panel object.

Panel:NoClipping.description: (Client) Method: Panel:NoClipping() Sets whenever all child drawings should be clipped within the panels bounds.

Panel:NumSelectedChildren.description: (Client) Method: Panel:NumSelectedChildren() Returns the number of children of the panel object that are selected. This is equivalent to calling {{ClassFunction|Panel|IsSelected}} on all child objects and counting the number of returns that are ''true''.

Panel:OpenURL.description: (Client) Method: Panel:OpenURL() [[Category:HTML]][[Category:Awesomium]]Instructs a HTML control to download and parse a HTML script using the passed URL.

Panel:PaintAt.description: (Client) Method: Panel:PaintAt() Paints a ghost copy of the panel at the given position.

Panel:PaintManual.description: (Client) Method: Panel:PaintManual() Paints the panel at its current position. To use this you must call {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetPaintedManually}}(true).

Panel:ParentToHUD.description: (Client) Method: Panel:ParentToHUD() Parents the panel to the HUD.

Panel:Paste.description: (Client) Method: Panel:Paste() {{Warning|Due to privacy concerns, this function has been disabled}}

Panel:PositionLabel.body: PositionLabel(${1:number lblWidth}, ${2:number x}, ${3:number y}, ${4:Panel lbl}, ${5:Panel panelObj})$0
Panel:PositionLabel.description: (Client) Method: Panel:PositionLabel() Sets the width and position of a DLabel and places the passed panel object directly to the right of it. Returns the ''y'' value of the bottom of the tallest object. The panel on which this method is run is not relevant; only the passed objects are affected.

Panel:PostMessage.description: (Client) Method: Panel:PostMessage() {{Deprecated|Only used in deprecated Derma controls.}}Sends a command to the panel.

Panel:Queue.description: (Client) Method: Panel:Queue() Enables the queue for panel animations. If enabled, the next new animation will begin after all current animations have ended. This must be called before {{ClassFunction|Panel|NewAnimation}} to work, and only applies to the next new animation. If you want to queue many, you must call this before each.

Panel:RebuildSpawnIcon.description: (Client) Method: Panel:RebuildSpawnIcon() Causes a SpawnIcon to rebuild its model image.

Panel:RebuildSpawnIconEx.description: (Client) Method: Panel:RebuildSpawnIconEx() Re-renders a spawn icon with customized cam data.

Panel:Receiver.description: (Client) Method: Panel:Receiver() Allows the panel to receive drag and drop events.

Panel:Refresh.description: (Client) Method: Panel:Refresh() Refreshes the HTML panel's current page.

Panel:Remove.description: (Client) Method: Panel:Remove() Marks a panel for deletion so it will be deleted on the next frame.

Panel:RequestFocus.description: (Client) Method: Panel:RequestFocus() Attempts to obtain focus for this panel.

Panel:ResetAllFades.description: (Client) Method: Panel:ResetAllFades() Resets all text fades in a RichText}} element made with {{ClassFunction|Panel|InsertFade.

Panel:RunJavascript.description: (Client) Method: Panel:RunJavascript() Runs/Executes a string as JavaScript code in [[:Category:DHTML|DHTML]] panel.

Panel:ScreenToLocal.description: (Client) Method: Panel:ScreenToLocal() Translates global screen coordinate to coordinates relative to the panel.

Panel:SelectAll.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SelectAll() Selects all items within a panel or object. For text-based objects, selects all text.

Panel:SelectAllOnFocus.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SelectAllOnFocus() If called on a text entry, clicking the text entry for the first time will automatically select all of the text ready to be copied by the user.

Panel:SelectAllText.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SelectAllText() Selects all the text in a panel object. Will not select non-text items; for this, use {{ClassFunction|Panel|SelectAll}}.

Panel:SelectNone.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SelectNone() Deselects all items in a panel object. For text-based objects, this will deselect all text.

Panel:SetAchievement.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetAchievement() Sets the achievement to be displayed by AchievementIcon.[[Category:AchievementIcon]]

Panel:SetActionFunction.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetActionFunction() {{Deprecated|Only used in deprecated Derma controls.}}

Panel:SetAllowNonAsciiCharacters.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetAllowNonAsciiCharacters() Configures a text input to allow user to type characters that are not included in the US-ASCII (7-bit ASCII) character set.

Panel:SetAlpha.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetAlpha() Sets the alpha multiplier for the panel

Panel:SetAnimationEnabled.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetAnimationEnabled() Enables or disables animations for the panel object by overriding the {{HookFunction|PANEL|AnimationThink}} hook to nil and back.

Panel:SetAutoDelete.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetAutoDelete() Sets whenever the panel should be removed if the parent was removed.

Panel:SetBGColor.body: SetBGColor(${1:number r or color}, ${2:number g}, ${3:number b}, ${4:number a})$0
Panel:SetBGColor.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetBGColor() Sets the background color of a panel such as a RichText}}, {{Type|Label}} or {{Type|DColorCube.

Panel:SetBGColorEx.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetBGColorEx() {{Internal}}Sets the background color of the panel.

Panel:SetCaretPos.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetCaretPos() Sets the position of the caret (or text cursor) in a text-based panel object.

Panel:SetCommand.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetCommand() Sets the action signal command that's fired when a Button}} is clicked. The hook {{HookFunction|PANEL|ActionSignal is called as the click response.

Panel:SetContentAlignment.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetContentAlignment() Sets the alignment of the contents.

Panel:SetConVar.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetConVar() Sets this panel's convar. When the convar changes this panel will update automatically.

Panel:SetCookie.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetCookie() Stores a string in the named cookie using {{ClassFunction|Panel|GetCookieName}} as prefix.

Panel:SetCookieName.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetCookieName() Sets the panel's cookie name. Calls {{HookFunction|PANEL|LoadCookies}} if defined.

Panel:SetCursor.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetCursor() Sets the appearance of the cursor.

Panel:SetDragParent.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetDragParent() Sets the drag parent.

Panel:SetDrawLanguageID.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetDrawLanguageID() Sets the visibility of the language selection box in a TextEntry when typing in non-English mode.

Panel:SetDrawLanguageIDAtLeft.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetDrawLanguageIDAtLeft() Sets where to draw the language selection box.

Panel:SetDrawOnTop.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetDrawOnTop() Makes the panel render in front of all others, including the spawn menu and main menu.

Panel:SetDropTarget.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetDropTarget() Sets the target area for dropping when an object is being dragged around this panel using the {{Lib|dragndrop}}.

Panel:SetEnabled.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetEnabled() Sets the enabled state of a disable-able panel object, such as a DButton}} or {{Type|DTextEntry.

Panel:SetExpensiveShadow.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetExpensiveShadow() Adds a shadow falling to the bottom right corner of the panel's text. This has no effect on panels that do not derive from Label.

Panel:SetFGColor.body: SetFGColor(${1:number r or color}, ${2:number g}, ${3:number b}, ${4:number a})$0
Panel:SetFGColor.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetFGColor() Sets the foreground color of a panel.

Panel:SetFGColorEx.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetFGColorEx() {{Internal}}Sets the foreground color of the panel.

Panel:SetFontInternal.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetFontInternal() Sets the font used to render this panel's text.

Panel:SetHeight.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetHeight() Sets the height of the panel.

Panel:SetHTML.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetHTML() [[Category:HTML]][[Category:Awesomium]]Allows you to set HTML code within a panel.

Panel:SetKeyBoardInputEnabled.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetKeyBoardInputEnabled() {{Deprecated|Alias of {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetKeyboardInputEnabled}}}}Enables or disables the keyboard input for the panel.

Panel:SetKeyboardInputEnabled.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetKeyboardInputEnabled() Allows or disallows the panel to receive keyboard focus and input. This is recursively applied to all children.

Panel:SetMinimumSize.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetMinimumSize() Sets the minimum dimensions of the panel or object.

Panel:SetModel.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetModel() [[Category:ModelImage]][[Category:SpawnIcon]]Sets the model to be displayed by SpawnIcon.[[Category:SpawnIcon]]

Panel:SetMouseInputEnabled.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetMouseInputEnabled() Enables or disables the mouse input for the panel.

Panel:SetMultiline.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetMultiline() Enables or disables the multi-line functionality of a text object, such as a DTextEntry.

Panel:SetName.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetName() Sets the internal name of the panel.

Panel:SetPaintBackgroundEnabled.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetPaintBackgroundEnabled() Sets whenever all the default background of the panel should be drawn or not.

Panel:SetPaintBorderEnabled.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetPaintBorderEnabled() Sets whenever all the default border of the panel should be drawn or not.

Panel:SetPaintedManually.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetPaintedManually() Enables or disables painting of the panel manually with {{ClassFunction|Panel|PaintManual}}.

Panel:SetParent.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetParent() Sets the parent of the panel.

Panel:SetPlayer.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetPlayer() Used by AvatarImage to load an avatar for given player.[[Category:AvatarImage]]

Panel:SetPopupStayAtBack.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetPopupStayAtBack() If this panel object has been made a popup with {{ClassFunction|Panel|MakePopup}}, this method will prevent it from drawing in front of other panels when it receives input focus.

Panel:SetPos.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetPos() Sets the position of the panel.

Panel:SetRenderInScreenshots.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetRenderInScreenshots() Sets whenever the panel should be rendered in the next screenshot.

Panel:SetSelectable.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetSelectable() Sets whether the panel object can be selected or not (like icons in the Spawn Menu, holding {{Key|Shift}}). If enabled, this will affect the function of a DButton}} whilst {{Key|Shift}} is pressed. {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetSelected can be used to select/deselect the object.

Panel:SetSelected.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetSelected() Sets the selected state of a selectable panel object. This functionality is set with {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetSelectable}} and checked with {{ClassFunction|Panel|IsSelectable}}.

Panel:SetSelectionCanvas.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetSelectionCanvas() Enables the panel object for selection (much like the spawn menu).

Panel:SetSize.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetSize() Sets the size of the panel.

Panel:SetSkin.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetSkin() Sets the derma skin that the panel object will use, and refreshes all panels with {{LibraryFunction|derma|RefreshSkins}}.

Panel:SetSpawnIcon.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetSpawnIcon() [[Category:ModelImage]][[Category:SpawnIcon]]Sets the [[Silkicons|silkicon]] of a panel object such as a SpawnIcon}} and {{Type|ModelImage.

Panel:SetSteamID.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetSteamID() Used by AvatarImage panels to load an avatar by its 64-bit Steam ID (community ID).[[Category:AvatarImage]]

Panel:SetTall.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetTall() Sets height of a panel. An alias of {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetHeight}}.

Panel:SetTerm.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetTerm() Removes the panel after given time in seconds.

Panel:SetText.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetText() Sets the text value of a panel object containing text, such as a Label}}, {{Type|TextEntry}} or {{Type|RichText}} and their derivatives, such as {{Type|DLabel}}, {{Type|DTextEntry}} or {{Type|DButton.

Panel:SetTextInset.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetTextInset() Sets the left and top text margins of a text-based panel object, such as a DButton}} or {{Type|DLabel.

Panel:SetToFullHeight.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetToFullHeight() Sets the height of a RichText element to accommodate the text inside.

Panel:SetTooltip.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetTooltip() Sets the tooltip to be displayed when a player hovers over the panel object with their cursor.

Panel:SetTooltipPanel.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetTooltipPanel() Sets the panel object to be displayed as a tooltip when a player hovers over the panel object with their cursor.

Panel:SetURL.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetURL() [[Category:DLabelURL]][[Category:URLLabel]]Sets the URL of a link-based panel such as DLabelURL.

Panel:SetVerticalScrollbarEnabled.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetVerticalScrollbarEnabled() Sets the visibility of the vertical scrollbar.

Panel:SetVisible.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetVisible() Sets the "visibility" of the panel.

Panel:SetWide.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetWide() Sets width of a panel. An alias of {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetWidth}}.

Panel:SetWidth.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetWidth() Sets the width of the panel.

Panel:SetWorldClicker.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetWorldClicker() This makes it so that when you're hovering over this panel you can `click` on the world. Your viewmodel will aim etc.

Panel:SetWrap.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetWrap() Sets whether text wrapping should be enabled or disabled on Label}} and {{Type|DLabel panels.

Panel:SetZPos.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SetZPos() Sets the panels z position which determines the rendering order.

Panel:Show.description: (Client) Method: Panel:Show() Makes a panel visible.

Panel:SizeTo.body: SizeTo(${1:number sizeW=0}, ${2:number sizeH=0}, ${3:number time}, ${4:number delay=0}, ${5:number ease=-1}, ${6:function callback})$0
Panel:SizeTo.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SizeTo() Uses animation to resize the panel to the specified size.

Panel:SizeToChildren.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SizeToChildren() Resizes the panel to fit the bounds of its children.

Panel:SizeToContents.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SizeToContents() Resizes the panel so that its width and height fit all of the content inside.

Panel:SizeToContentsX.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SizeToContentsX() Resizes the panel object's width to accommodate all child objects/contents.

Panel:SizeToContentsY.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SizeToContentsY() Resizes the panel object's height to accommodate all child objects/contents.

Panel:SlideDown.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SlideDown() Slides the panel in from above.

Panel:SlideUp.description: (Client) Method: Panel:SlideUp() Slides the panel out to the top.

Panel:StartBoxSelection.description: (Client) Method: Panel:StartBoxSelection() Begins a box selection, enables mouse capture for the panel object, and sets the start point of the selection box to the mouse cursor's position, relative to this object. For this to work, either the object or its parent must be enabled as a selection canvas. This is set using {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetSelectionCanvas}}.

Panel:Stop.description: (Client) Method: Panel:Stop() Stops all panel animations by clearing its animation list. This also clears all delayed animations.

Panel:StopLoading.description: (Client) Method: Panel:StopLoading() Stops the loading of the HTML panel's current page.

Panel:StretchBottomTo.description: (Client) Method: Panel:StretchBottomTo() Resizes the panel object's height so that its bottom is aligned with the top of the passed panel. An offset greater than zero will reduce the panel's height to leave a gap between it and the passed panel.

Panel:StretchRightTo.description: (Client) Method: Panel:StretchRightTo() Resizes the panel object's width so that its right edge is aligned with the left of the passed panel. An offset greater than zero will reduce the panel's width to leave a gap between it and the passed panel.

Panel:StretchToParent.description: (Client) Method: Panel:StretchToParent() Sets the dimensions of the panel to fill its parent. It will only stretch in directions that aren't nil.
