Panel:ToggleSelection.description: (Client) Method: Panel:ToggleSelection() Toggles the selected state of a selectable panel object. This functionality is set with {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetSelectable}} and checked with {{ClassFunction|Panel|IsSelectable}}. To check whether the object is selected or not, {{ClassFunction|Panel|IsSelected}} is used.

Panel:ToggleVisible.description: (Client) Method: Panel:ToggleVisible() Toggles the visibility of a panel and all its children.

Panel:UnselectAll.description: (Client) Method: Panel:UnselectAll() Recursively deselects this panel object and all of its children. This will cascade to all child objects at every level below the parent.

Panel:Valid.description: (Client) Method: Panel:Valid() {{Deprecated|Use {{ClassFunction|Panel|IsValid}} instead.}}Returns if a given panel is valid or not.

PathFollower:Chase.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:Chase() If you created your path with type "Chase" this functions should be used in place of {{ClassFunction|PathFollower|Update}} to cause the bot to chase the specified entity.

PathFollower:Compute.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:Compute() Compute shortest path from bot to 'goal' via A* algorithm.

PathFollower:Draw.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:Draw() Draws the path. This is meant for debugging - and uses debug overlay.

PathFollower:FirstSegment.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:FirstSegment() Returns the first segment of the path.

PathFollower:GetAge.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:GetAge() Returns the age since the path was built

PathFollower:GetAllSegments.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:GetAllSegments() Returns all of the segments of the given path.

PathFollower:GetClosestPosition.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:GetClosestPosition() The closest position along the path to a position

PathFollower:GetCurrentGoal.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:GetCurrentGoal() Returns the current goal data. Can return nil if the current goal is invalid, for example immediately after {{ClassFunction|PathFollower|Update}}.

PathFollower:GetCursorData.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:GetCursorData() Returns the cursor data

PathFollower:GetCursorPosition.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:GetCursorPosition() Returns the current progress along the path

PathFollower:GetEnd.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:GetEnd() Returns the path end position

PathFollower:GetLength.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:GetLength() Returns the total length of the path

PathFollower:GetPositionOnPath.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:GetPositionOnPath() Returns the vector position of distance along path

PathFollower:GetStart.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:GetStart() Returns the path start position

PathFollower:Invalidate.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:Invalidate() Invalidates the current path

PathFollower:IsValid.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:IsValid() Returns true if the path is valid

PathFollower:LastSegment.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:LastSegment() Returns the last segment of the path.

PathFollower:MoveCursor.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:MoveCursor() Moves the cursor by give distance.

PathFollower:MoveCursorTo.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:MoveCursorTo() Sets the cursor position to given distance.

PathFollower:MoveCursorToClosestPosition.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:MoveCursorToClosestPosition() Moves the cursor of the path to the closest position compared to given vector.

PathFollower:MoveCursorToEnd.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:MoveCursorToEnd() Moves the cursor to the end of the path

PathFollower:MoveCursorToStart.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:MoveCursorToStart() Moves the cursor to the end of the path

PathFollower:ResetAge.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:ResetAge() Resets the age which is retrieved by {{ClassFunction|PathFollower|GetAge}} to 0.

PathFollower:SetGoalTolerance.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:SetGoalTolerance() How close we can get to the goal to call it done

PathFollower:SetMinLookAheadDistance.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:SetMinLookAheadDistance() Sets minimum range movement goal must be along path

PathFollower:Update.description: (Server) Method: PathFollower:Update() Move the bot along the path.

PhysObj:AddAngleVelocity.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:AddAngleVelocity() Adds the specified velocity to the current.

PhysObj:AddGameFlag.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:AddGameFlag() Adds one or more bit flags.

PhysObj:AddVelocity.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:AddVelocity() Adds the specified velocity to the current.

PhysObj:AlignAngles.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:AlignAngles() {{Stub}}Rotates the object so that it's angles are aligned to the ones inputted.

PhysObj:ApplyForceCenter.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:ApplyForceCenter() Applies the specified force to the physics object. (in Newtons)

PhysObj:ApplyForceOffset.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:ApplyForceOffset() Applies the specified force on the physics object at the specified position

PhysObj:ClearGameFlag.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:ClearGameFlag() Removes one of more specified flags.

PhysObj:ComputeShadowControl.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:ComputeShadowControl() Allows you to move a PhysObj to a point and angle in 3D space.

PhysObj:EnableCollisions.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:EnableCollisions() Sets whenever the physics object should not collide with anything.

PhysObj:EnableDrag.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:EnableDrag() Sets whenever the physics object should be affected by drag.

PhysObj:EnableGravity.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:EnableGravity() Sets whenever the physobject should be affected by gravity

PhysObj:EnableMotion.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:EnableMotion() Sets whenever the physobject should be able to move or not.

PhysObj:GetAABB.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:GetAABB() Returns the mins and max of the physics object.

PhysObj:GetAngles.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:GetAngles() Returns the angles of the physics object.

PhysObj:GetAngleVelocity.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:GetAngleVelocity() Gets the angular velocity of the object in degrees per second.

PhysObj:GetDamping.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:GetDamping() Returns the linear and angular damping of the physics object.

PhysObj:GetEnergy.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:GetEnergy() Returns the kinetic energy of the physobject.

PhysObj:GetEntity.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:GetEntity() Returns the parent entity of the physics object.

PhysObj:GetInertia.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:GetInertia() Returns the directional inertia of the physics object.

PhysObj:GetInvInertia.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:GetInvInertia() Returns 1 divided by the inertia.

PhysObj:GetInvMass.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:GetInvMass() Returns 1 divided by the physics object's mass.

PhysObj:GetMass.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:GetMass() Returns the mass of the physics object.

PhysObj:GetMassCenter.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:GetMassCenter() Returns the center of mass of the physics object as a local vector.

PhysObj:GetMaterial.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:GetMaterial() Returns the physical material of the physics object.

PhysObj:GetMesh.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:GetMesh() Returns a table of {{Struct|MeshVertex}}s where each 3 vertices represent a triangle.

PhysObj:GetMeshConvexes.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:GetMeshConvexes() Returns a structured table, the physics mesh of the physics object.

PhysObj:GetName.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:GetName() Returns the name of the physics object.

PhysObj:GetPos.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:GetPos() Returns the position of the physics object.

PhysObj:GetRotDamping.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:GetRotDamping() Returns the rotation damping of the physics object.

PhysObj:GetSpeedDamping.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:GetSpeedDamping() Returns the speed damping of the physics object.

PhysObj:GetStress.description: (Server) Method: PhysObj:GetStress() Returns the stress of the entity.

PhysObj:GetSurfaceArea.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:GetSurfaceArea() Returns the surface area of the physics object in source-units.

PhysObj:GetVelocity.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:GetVelocity() Returns the absolute directional velocity of the physobject.

PhysObj:GetVolume.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:GetVolume() Returns the volume in source units.

PhysObj:HasGameFlag.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:HasGameFlag() Returns whenever the specified flag(s) is/are set.

PhysObj:IsAsleep.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:IsAsleep() Returns whether the physics object is "sleeping".

PhysObj:IsCollisionEnabled.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:IsCollisionEnabled() Returns whenever the entity is able to collide or not.

PhysObj:IsDragEnabled.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:IsDragEnabled() Returns whenever the entity is affected by drag.

PhysObj:IsGravityEnabled.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:IsGravityEnabled() Returns whenever the entity is affected by gravity.

PhysObj:IsMotionEnabled.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:IsMotionEnabled() Returns if the physics object can move itself (by velocity, acceleration)

PhysObj:IsMoveable.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:IsMoveable() Returns whenever the entity is able to move.

PhysObj:IsPenetrating.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:IsPenetrating() Returns whenever the physics object is penetrating another physics object.

PhysObj:IsValid.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:IsValid() Returns if the physics object is valid/not NULL.

PhysObj:LocalToWorld.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:LocalToWorld() Mapping a vector in local frame of the physics object to world frame.

PhysObj:LocalToWorldVector.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:LocalToWorldVector() Rotate a vector from the local frame of the physics object to world frame.

PhysObj:OutputDebugInfo.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:OutputDebugInfo() Prints debug info about the state of the physics object to the console.

PhysObj:RecheckCollisionFilter.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:RecheckCollisionFilter() Call this when the collision filter conditions change due to this object's state (e.g. changing solid type or collision group)

PhysObj:RotateAroundAxis.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:RotateAroundAxis() A convinience function for {{ClassFunction|Angle|RotateAroundAxis}}.

PhysObj:SetAngles.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:SetAngles() Sets the angles of the physobject.

PhysObj:SetBuoyancyRatio.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:SetBuoyancyRatio() Sets the buoyancy ratio of the physics object. (How well it floats in water)

PhysObj:SetDamping.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:SetDamping() Sets the linear and angular damping of the physics object.

PhysObj:SetDragCoefficient.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:SetDragCoefficient() Modifies how much drag (air resistance) affects the object.

PhysObj:SetInertia.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:SetInertia() Sets the directional inertia.

PhysObj:SetMass.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:SetMass() Sets the mass of the physobject.

PhysObj:SetMaterial.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:SetMaterial() Sets the material of the physobject.

PhysObj:SetPos.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:SetPos() Sets the position of the physobject.

PhysObj:SetVelocity.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:SetVelocity() Sets the velocity of the physics object for the next iteration.

PhysObj:SetVelocityInstantaneous.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:SetVelocityInstantaneous() Sets the velocity of the physics object.

PhysObj:Sleep.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:Sleep() Makes the physics object "sleep".

PhysObj:UpdateShadow.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:UpdateShadow() Unlike {{ClassFunction|PhysObj|SetPos}} and {{ClassFunction|PhysObj|SetAngles}}, this allows the movement of a physobj while leaving physics interactions intact.

PhysObj:Wake.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:Wake() Wakes the physics object.

PhysObj:WorldToLocal.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:WorldToLocal() Converts a vector to a relative to the physics object coordinate system.

PhysObj:WorldToLocalVector.description: (Shared) Method: PhysObj:WorldToLocalVector() Rotate a vector from the world frame to the local frame of the physics object.

Player:AccountID.description: (Shared) Method: Player:AccountID() Returns the player's AccountID aka 32bit SteamID.

Player:AddCleanup.description: (Shared) Method: Player:AddCleanup() Adds an entity to the players clean up list.

Player:AddCount.description: (Shared) Method: Player:AddCount() Adds an entity to the total count of entities of same class.

Player:AddDeaths.description: (Server) Method: Player:AddDeaths() Add a certain amount to the player's death count

Player:AddFrags.description: (Server) Method: Player:AddFrags() Add a certain amount to the player's frag count (or kills count)

Player:AddFrozenPhysicsObject.description: (Server) Method: Player:AddFrozenPhysicsObject() Adds a entity to the players list of frozen objects.

Player:AddPlayerOption.body: AddPlayerOption(${1:string name}, ${2:number timeout}, ${3:function vote callback}, ${4:function draw callback})$0
Player:AddPlayerOption.description: (Client) Method: Player:AddPlayerOption() Sets up the voting system for the player.

Player:AddVCDSequenceToGestureSlot.description: (Shared) Method: Player:AddVCDSequenceToGestureSlot() Plays a sequence directly from a sequence number, similar to {{ClassFunction|Player|AnimRestartGesture}}. This function has the advantage to play sequences that haven't been bound to an existing {{Enum|ACT}}

Player:Alive.description: (Shared) Method: Player:Alive() Checks if the player is alive.

Player:AllowFlashlight.description: (Shared) Method: Player:AllowFlashlight() Sets if the player can toggle his flashlight. Function exists on both the server and client but has no effect when ran on the client.

Player:AllowImmediateDecalPainting.description: (Server) Method: Player:AllowImmediateDecalPainting() Lets the player spray his decal without delay

Player:AnimResetGestureSlot.description: (Shared) Method: Player:AnimResetGestureSlot() Resets player gesture in selected slot.

Player:AnimRestartGesture.description: (Shared) Method: Player:AnimRestartGesture() Restart a gesture on a player, within a gesture slot.

Player:AnimRestartMainSequence.description: (Shared) Method: Player:AnimRestartMainSequence() Restarts the main animation on the player, has the same effect as calling {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetCycle}}( 0 ).

Player:AnimSetGestureSequence.description: (Shared) Method: Player:AnimSetGestureSequence() Sets the sequence of the animation playing in the given gesture slot.

Player:AnimSetGestureWeight.description: (Shared) Method: Player:AnimSetGestureWeight() Sets the weight of the animation playing in the given gesture slot.

Player:Armor.description: (Shared) Method: Player:Armor() Returns the player's armor.

Player:Ban.description: (Server) Method: Player:Ban() Bans the player from the server for a certain amount of minutes.

Player:CanUseFlashlight.description: (Shared) Method: Player:CanUseFlashlight() Returns true if the player's flashlight hasn't been disabled by {{ClassFunction| Player|AllowFlashlight}}

Player:ChatPrint.description: (Shared) Method: Player:ChatPrint() Prints a string to the chatbox of the client.

Player:CheckLimit.description: (Shared) Method: Player:CheckLimit() Checks if the limit is hit or not. If it is, it will throw a notification saying so.

Player:ConCommand.description: (Shared) Method: Player:ConCommand() Runs the concommand on the player. This does not work on bots.

Player:CreateRagdoll.description: (Server) Method: Player:CreateRagdoll() Creates the player's ragdoll entity.

Player:CrosshairDisable.description: (Server) Method: Player:CrosshairDisable() Disables a players crosshair.

Player:CrosshairEnable.description: (Server) Method: Player:CrosshairEnable() Enables crosshair of player.

Player:Crouching.description: (Shared) Method: Player:Crouching() Returns whether the player is crouching or not

Player:Deaths.description: (Shared) Method: Player:Deaths() Returns the player's death count

Player:DebugInfo.description: (Server) Method: Player:DebugInfo() Prints the players' name and position to the console.

Player:DetonateTripmines.description: (Server) Method: Player:DetonateTripmines() Detonates all tripmines belonging to the player.

Player:DoAnimationEvent.description: (Shared) Method: Player:DoAnimationEvent() Sends a third person animation event to the player.

Player:DoAttackEvent.description: (Shared) Method: Player:DoAttackEvent() Starts the player's attack animation. The attack animation is determined by the weapon's HoldType.

Player:DoCustomAnimEvent.description: (Shared) Method: Player:DoCustomAnimEvent() Sends a specified third person animation event to the player.

Player:DoReloadEvent.description: (Shared) Method: Player:DoReloadEvent() Sends a third person reload animation event to the player.

Player:DoSecondaryAttack.description: (Shared) Method: Player:DoSecondaryAttack() Sends a third person secondary fire animation event to the player.

Player:DrawViewModel.description: (Server) Method: Player:DrawViewModel() Show/Hide the player's weapon's viewmodel.

Player:DrawWorldModel.description: (Server) Method: Player:DrawWorldModel() Show/Hide the player's weapon's worldmodel.

Player:DropNamedWeapon.description: (Server) Method: Player:DropNamedWeapon() Drops the players' weapon of a specific class.

Player:DropObject.description: (Server) Method: Player:DropObject() Drops any object the player is currently holding with either gravitygun or +Use (E key)

Player:DropWeapon.description: (Server) Method: Player:DropWeapon() Forces the player to drop the specified weapon

Player:EnterVehicle.description: (Server) Method: Player:EnterVehicle() Enters the player into specified vehicle

Player:EquipSuit.description: (Server) Method: Player:EquipSuit() Equips the player with the HEV suit.

Player:ExitVehicle.description: (Server) Method: Player:ExitVehicle() Makes the player exit the vehicle if they're in one.

Player:Flashlight.description: (Server) Method: Player:Flashlight() Enables/Disables the player's flashlight

Player:FlashlightIsOn.description: (Shared) Method: Player:FlashlightIsOn() Returns true if the player's flashlight is on.

Player:Frags.description: (Shared) Method: Player:Frags() Returns the amount of kills a player has.

Player:Freeze.description: (Server) Method: Player:Freeze() Freeze/Unfreezes the player. Frozen players cannot move, attack or turn around. Keybindings are still called. Similar to {{ClassFunction|Player|Lock}}.

Player:GetActiveWeapon.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetActiveWeapon() Returns the player's active weapon.

Player:GetAimVector.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetAimVector() Returns the direction that the player is aiming.

Player:GetAllowFullRotation.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetAllowFullRotation() Returns true if the players' model is allowed to rotate around the pitch and roll axis.

Player:GetAllowWeaponsInVehicle.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetAllowWeaponsInVehicle() Returns whether the player is allowed to use his weapons in a vehicle or not.

Player:GetAmmoCount.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetAmmoCount() Gets the amount of ammo the player has.

Player:GetAvoidPlayers.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetAvoidPlayers() Gets if the player will be pushed out of nocollided players.

Player:GetCanWalk.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetCanWalk() Returns true if the player is able to walk using the (default) alt key.

Player:GetCanZoom.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetCanZoom() Determines whenever the player is allowed to use the zoom functionality.

Player:GetClassID.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetClassID() Returns the player's class id.

Player:GetCount.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetCount() Gets total count of entities of same class.

Player:GetCrouchedWalkSpeed.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetCrouchedWalkSpeed() Gets the crouched walk speed.

Player:GetCurrentCommand.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetCurrentCommand() Returns the last command which was sent by the specified player. Can only be used in a [[:Category:Predicted_Hooks|Predicted Hook]].

Player:GetCurrentViewOffset.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetCurrentViewOffset() Gets the '''actual''' view offset which equals the difference between the players actual position and their view when standing.

Player:GetDrivingEntity.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetDrivingEntity() Gets the entity the player is currently driving.

Player:GetDrivingMode.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetDrivingMode() Returns driving mode of the player. See [[Entity Driving]].

Player:GetDuckSpeed.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetDuckSpeed() Returns a player's duck speed (in seconds)

Player:GetEyeTrace.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetEyeTrace() Returns a table with information of what the player is looking at.

Player:GetEyeTraceNoCursor.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetEyeTraceNoCursor() Returns the trace according to the players view direction, ignoring their mouse ( Holding C and moving the mouse in Sandbox ).

Player:GetFOV.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetFOV() Returns the FOV of the player.

Player:GetFriendStatus.description: (Client) Method: Player:GetFriendStatus() Returns the steam "relationship" towards the player.

Player:GetHands.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetHands() Gets the hands entity of a player

Player:GetHoveredWidget.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetHoveredWidget() Returns the widget the player is hovering with his mouse.

Player:GetHull.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetHull() Gets the bottom base and the top base size of the player's hull.

Player:GetHullDuck.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetHullDuck() Gets the bottom base and the top base size of the player's crouch hull.

Player:GetInfo.description: (Server) Method: Player:GetInfo() Retrieves the value of a client-side ConVar}}. The {{Type|ConVar must have a [[Enums/FCVAR|FCVAR_USERINFO]] flag for this to work.

Player:GetInfoNum.description: (Server) Method: Player:GetInfoNum() Retrieves the numeric value of a client-side convar, returns nil if value is not convertible to a number. The ConVar must have a [[Enums/FCVAR|FCVAR_USERINFO]] flag for this to work.

Player:GetJumpPower.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetJumpPower() Returns the jump power of the player

Player:GetLaggedMovementValue.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetLaggedMovementValue() Returns the timescale multiplier of the player movement.

Player:GetMaxSpeed.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetMaxSpeed() Returns the player's maximum movement speed.

Player:GetName.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetName() Returns the player's name, this is an alias of {{ClassFunction|Player|Nick}}.

Player:GetNoCollideWithTeammates.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetNoCollideWithTeammates() Returns whenever the player is set not to collide with their teammates.

Player:GetObserverMode.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetObserverMode() Returns the the observer mode of the player

Player:GetObserverTarget.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetObserverTarget() Returns the entity the player is currently observing. Returns no value if the player has no target.

Player:GetPData.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetPData() Returns a player's PData from the server's or client's SQL database. ( sv.db and cl.db respectively ) It is not networked!

Player:GetPlayerColor.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetPlayerColor() Returns a player model's color. The part of the model that is colored is determined by the model itself, and is different for each model. The format is Vector(r,g,b), and each color should be between 0 and 1.

Player:GetPlayerInfo.description: (Client) Method: Player:GetPlayerInfo() Returns a table containing player information.

Player:GetPressedWidget.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetPressedWidget() Returns the widget entity the player is using.

Player:GetRagdollEntity.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetRagdollEntity() Returns players death ragdoll

Player:GetRenderAngles.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetRenderAngles() Returns the render angles for the player.

Player:GetRunSpeed.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetRunSpeed() Returns the amount of speed the player runs at.

Player:GetShootPos.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetShootPos() Returns the position of a Player's view

Player:GetStepSize.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetStepSize() Returns the maximum height player can step onto.

Player:GetTimeoutSeconds.description: (Server) Method: Player:GetTimeoutSeconds() Returns the number of seconds that the player has been timing out for. You can check if a player is timing out with {{ClassFunction|Player|IsTimingOut}}.

Player:GetTool.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetTool() Returns TOOL table of players current tool, or of the one specified.

Player:GetUnDuckSpeed.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetUnDuckSpeed() Returns a player's unduck speed (in seconds)

Player:GetUserGroup.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetUserGroup() Returns the player's user group.

Player:GetVehicle.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetVehicle() Gets the vehicle the player is driving, returns NULL ENTITY if the player is not driving.

Player:GetViewEntity.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetViewEntity() Returns the entity the player is using to see from (such as the player itself, the camera, or another entity).

Player:GetViewModel.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetViewModel() Returns the player's view model entity by the index.

Player:GetViewOffset.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetViewOffset() Returns the view offset of the player which equals the difference between the players actual position and their view.

Player:GetViewOffsetDucked.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetViewOffsetDucked() Returns the view offset of the player which equals the difference between the players actual position and their view when ducked.

Player:GetViewPunchAngles.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetViewPunchAngles() Returns players screen punch effect angle.

Player:GetWalkSpeed.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetWalkSpeed() Returns a player's walk speed

Player:GetWeapon.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetWeapon() Returns the weapon for the specified class

Player:GetWeaponColor.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetWeaponColor() Returns a player's weapon color. The part of the model that is colored is determined by the model itself, and is different for each model. The format is Vector(r,g,b), and each color should be between 0 and 1.

Player:GetWeapons.description: (Shared) Method: Player:GetWeapons() Returns a table of the player's weapons.

Player:Give.description: (Server) Method: Player:Give() Give the player a weapon

Player:GiveAmmo.description: (Server) Method: Player:GiveAmmo() Gives ammo to a player

Player:GodDisable.description: (Server) Method: Player:GodDisable() Disables god mode on the player.

Player:GodEnable.description: (Server) Method: Player:GodEnable() Enables god mode on the player.

Player:HasGodMode.description: (Shared) Method: Player:HasGodMode() Returns whether the player has god mode or not, contolled by {{ClassFunction|Player|GodEnable}} and {{ClassFunction|Player|GodDisable}}.

Player:HasWeapon.description: (Shared) Method: Player:HasWeapon() Returns if the player has the specified weapon

Player:InVehicle.description: (Shared) Method: Player:InVehicle() Returns if the player is in a vehicle

Player:IPAddress.description: (Server) Method: Player:IPAddress() Returns the player's IP address and connection port in ip:port form

Player:IsAdmin.description: (Shared) Method: Player:IsAdmin() Returns whether the player is an admin or not

Player:IsBot.description: (Shared) Method: Player:IsBot() Returns if the player is an bot or not

Player:IsConnected.description: (Server) Method: Player:IsConnected() Returns true from the point when the player is sending client info but not fully in the game until they disconnect.

Player:IsDrivingEntity.description: (Shared) Method: Player:IsDrivingEntity() Used to find out if a player is currently 'driving' an entity (by which we mean 'right click > drive' ).

Player:IsFrozen.description: (Shared) Method: Player:IsFrozen() Returns whether the players movement is currently frozen, contolled by {{ClassFunction|Player|Freeze}}.

Player:IsFullyAuthenticated.description: (Server) Method: Player:IsFullyAuthenticated() Returns whether the player identity was confirmed by the steam network.

Player:IsListenServerHost.description: (Server) Method: Player:IsListenServerHost() Returns if a player is the host of the current session.

Player:IsMuted.description: (Client) Method: Player:IsMuted() Returns whether or not the player is muted locally.

Player:IsPlayingTaunt.description: (Shared) Method: Player:IsPlayingTaunt() Returns true if the player is playing a taunt.

Player:IsSpeaking.description: (Client) Method: Player:IsSpeaking() Returns whenever the player is heard by the local player.

Player:IsSuitEquipped.description: (Shared) Method: Player:IsSuitEquipped() Returns whenever the player is equipped with the suit item.

Player:IsSuperAdmin.description: (Shared) Method: Player:IsSuperAdmin() Returns whether the player is a superadmin.

Player:IsTimingOut.description: (Server) Method: Player:IsTimingOut() Returns true if the player is timing out (i.e. is losing connection), false otherwise.

Player:IsTyping.description: (Shared) Method: Player:IsTyping() Returns whether the player is typing in their chat.

Player:IsUserGroup.description: (Shared) Method: Player:IsUserGroup() Returns true/false if the player is in specified group or not.

Player:IsVoiceAudible.description: (Client) Method: Player:IsVoiceAudible() Returns if the player can be heard by the local player.

Player:IsWorldClicking.description: (Shared) Method: Player:IsWorldClicking() Returns if the player is in the context menu.

Player:KeyDown.description: (Shared) Method: Player:KeyDown() Gets whether a key is down

Player:KeyDownLast.description: (Shared) Method: Player:KeyDownLast() Gets whether a key was down one tick ago.

Player:KeyPressed.description: (Shared) Method: Player:KeyPressed() Gets whether a key was just pressed this tick

Player:KeyReleased.description: (Shared) Method: Player:KeyReleased() Gets whether a key was just released this tick

Player:Kick.description: (Server) Method: Player:Kick() Kicks the player from the server.

Player:Kill.description: (Server) Method: Player:Kill() Kills a player and calls {{HookFunction|GM|PlayerDeath}}.

Player:KillSilent.description: (Server) Method: Player:KillSilent() Kills a player without notifying the rest of the server.

Player:LagCompensation.description: (Shared) Method: Player:LagCompensation() This allows the server to mitigate the lag of the player by moving back all the entities that can be lag compensated to the time the player attacked with his weapon.

Player:LastHitGroup.description: (Server) Method: Player:LastHitGroup() Returns the hitgroup where the player was last hit.

Player:LimitHit.description: (Shared) Method: Player:LimitHit() Shows "limit hit" notification in sandbox.

Player:Lock.description: (Server) Method: Player:Lock() Stops a player from using any inputs, such as moving and shooting. Similar to {{ClassFunction|Player|Freeze}} but the player remains frozen/locked after death.

Player:MotionSensorPos.description: (Shared) Method: Player:MotionSensorPos() Returns the position of a Kinect bone.

Player:Name.description: (Shared) Method: Player:Name() Returns the players name. Identical to {{ClassFunction|Player|Nick}} and {{ClassFunction|Player|GetName}}

Player:Nick.description: (Shared) Method: Player:Nick() Returns the player's nickname

Player:PacketLoss.description: (Server) Method: Player:PacketLoss() Returns the packet loss of the client. It is not networked so it only returns 0 when run clientside.

Player:PhysgunUnfreeze.description: (Shared) Method: Player:PhysgunUnfreeze() Unfreezes the props player is looking at. This is essentially the same as pressing reload with the physics gun, including double press for unfreeze all.

Player:PickupObject.description: (Server) Method: Player:PickupObject() This makes the player hold ( same as pressing {{Key|E}} on a small prop ) the provided entity.

Player:Ping.description: (Shared) Method: Player:Ping() Returns the player's ping to server.

Player:PlayStepSound.description: (Server) Method: Player:PlayStepSound() Plays the correct step sound according to what the player is staying on.

Player:PrintMessage.description: (Shared) Method: Player:PrintMessage() Displays a message either in their chat, console, or center of the screen. See also {{GlobalFunction|PrintMessage}}.

Player:RemoveAllAmmo.description: (Server) Method: Player:RemoveAllAmmo() Removes all ammo from a certain player

Player:RemoveAllItems.description: (Server) Method: Player:RemoveAllItems() Removes all weapons and ammonition from the player.

Player:RemoveAmmo.description: (Shared) Method: Player:RemoveAmmo() Removes the amount of the specified ammo from the player.

Player:RemovePData.description: (Shared) Method: Player:RemovePData() Deletes a key from a player's data

Player:RemoveSuit.description: (Server) Method: Player:RemoveSuit() Strips the player's suit item.

Player:ResetHull.description: (Shared) Method: Player:ResetHull() Resets both normal and duck hulls to their default values.

Player:Say.description: (Server) Method: Player:Say() Forces the player to say whatever the first argument is. Works on bots too.

Player:SelectWeapon.description: (Server) Method: Player:SelectWeapon() Sets the active weapon of the player by its class name.

Player:SendHint.description: (Server) Method: Player:SendHint() Sends a hint to a player.

Player:SendLua.description: (Server) Method: Player:SendLua() Executes a simple Lua string on the player.

Player:SetActiveWeapon.description: (Server) Method: Player:SetActiveWeapon() Sets the player's active weapon.

Player:SetAllowFullRotation.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetAllowFullRotation() Set if the players' model is allowed to rotate around the pitch and roll axis.

Player:SetAllowWeaponsInVehicle.description: (Server) Method: Player:SetAllowWeaponsInVehicle() Allows player to use his weapons in a vehicle. You need to call this before entering a vehicle.

Player:SetAmmo.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetAmmo() Sets the amount of of the specified ammo for the player.

Player:SetArmor.description: (Server) Method: Player:SetArmor() Sets the player armor to the argument.

Player:SetAvoidPlayers.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetAvoidPlayers() Pushes the player away from another player whenever it's inside the other players bounding box.

Player:SetCanWalk.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetCanWalk() Set if the player should be allowed to walk using the (default) alt key.

Player:SetCanZoom.description: (Server) Method: Player:SetCanZoom() Sets whether the player can use the HL2 suit zoom ("+zoom" bind) or not.

Player:SetClassID.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetClassID() Sets the player's class id.

Player:SetCrouchedWalkSpeed.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetCrouchedWalkSpeed() Sets the crouched walk speed multiplier.

Player:SetCurrentViewOffset.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetCurrentViewOffset() Sets the '''actual''' view offset which equals the difference between the players actual position and their view when standing.

Player:SetDeaths.description: (Server) Method: Player:SetDeaths() Sets a player's death count

Player:SetDSP.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetDSP() Applies the specified sound filter to the player.

Player:SetDuckSpeed.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetDuckSpeed() Sets how quickly a player ducks.

Player:SetEyeAngles.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetEyeAngles() Sets the angle of the player's view (may rotate body too if angular difference is large)

Player:SetFOV.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetFOV() Set a player's FOV (Field Of View) over a certain amount of time.

Player:SetFrags.description: (Server) Method: Player:SetFrags() Sets a player's frags (kills)

Player:SetHands.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetHands() Sets the hands entity of a player.

Player:SetHoveredWidget.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetHoveredWidget() Sets the widget that is currently hovered by the player's mouse.

Player:SetHull.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetHull() Sets the mins and maxs of the AABB of the players collision.

Player:SetHullDuck.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetHullDuck() Sets the mins and maxs of the AABB of the players collision when ducked.

Player:SetJumpPower.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetJumpPower() Sets the jump power, eg. the velocity the player will applied to when he jumps.

Player:SetLaggedMovementValue.description: (Server) Method: Player:SetLaggedMovementValue() Slows down the player movement simulation by the timescale, this is used internally in the HL2 weapon stripping sequence.

Player:SetMaxSpeed.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetMaxSpeed() Sets the maximum speed which the player can move at.

Player:SetMuted.description: (Client) Method: Player:SetMuted() Sets if the player should be muted locally.

Player:SetNoCollideWithTeammates.description: (Server) Method: Player:SetNoCollideWithTeammates() Sets whenever the player should not collide with their teammates.

Player:SetNoTarget.description: (Server) Method: Player:SetNoTarget() Sets the players visibility towards NPCs.

Player:SetObserverMode.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetObserverMode() Sets the players observer mode.

Player:SetPData.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetPData() Sets a player's PData from the server's or client's SQL database ( sv.db and cl.db respectively ), It is not networked!

Player:SetPlayerColor.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetPlayerColor() Sets the player model's color. The part of the model that is colored is determined by the model itself, and is different for each model.

Player:SetPressedWidget.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetPressedWidget() Sets the widget that is currently in use by the player's mouse.

Player:SetRenderAngles.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetRenderAngles() Sets the render angles of a player.

Player:SetRunSpeed.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetRunSpeed() Sets the run speed eg. the speed when sprinting.

Player:SetStepSize.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetStepSize() Sets the maximum height a player can step onto without jumping.

Player:SetSuppressPickupNotices.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetSuppressPickupNotices() Sets whenever to suppress the pickup notification for the player.

Player:SetTeam.description: (Server) Method: Player:SetTeam() Sets the player to the chosen team.

Player:SetUnDuckSpeed.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetUnDuckSpeed() Sets how quickly a player un-ducks

Player:SetupHands.description: (Server) Method: Player:SetupHands() Sets up the players view model hands. Calls {{HookFunction|GM|PlayerSetHandsModel}} to set the model of the hands.

Player:SetUserGroup.description: (Server) Method: Player:SetUserGroup() Sets the usergroup of the player.

Player:SetViewEntity.description: (Server) Method: Player:SetViewEntity() Attaches the players view to the position and angles of the specified entity.

Player:SetViewOffset.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetViewOffset() Sets the '''desired''' view offset which equals the difference between the players actual position and their view when standing.

Player:SetViewOffsetDucked.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetViewOffsetDucked() Sets the '''desired''' view offset which equals the difference between the players actual position and their view when crouching.

Player:SetViewPunchAngles.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetViewPunchAngles() Sets client's view punch. See {{ClassFunction|Player|ViewPunch}}

Player:SetWalkSpeed.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetWalkSpeed() Sets the walk speed eg. the speed when normally walking.

Player:SetWeaponColor.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SetWeaponColor() Sets the player weapon's color. The part of the model that is colored is determined by the model itself, and is different for each model.

Player:ShouldDrawLocalPlayer.description: (Client) Method: Player:ShouldDrawLocalPlayer() Polls the engine to request if the player should be drawn at the time the function is called.

Player:ShouldDropWeapon.description: (Server) Method: Player:ShouldDropWeapon() Sets whether the player's current weapon should drop on death.

Player:ShowProfile.description: (Client) Method: Player:ShowProfile() Opens the player steam profile page in the steam overlay browser.

Player:SimulateGravGunDrop.description: (Server) Method: Player:SimulateGravGunDrop() Signals the entity that it was dropped by the gravity gun.

Player:SimulateGravGunPickup.description: (Server) Method: Player:SimulateGravGunPickup() Signals the entity that it was picked up by the gravity gun. This call is only required if you want to simulate the situation of picking up objects.

Player:Spectate.description: (Server) Method: Player:Spectate() Sets the spectate mode of the player.

Player:SpectateEntity.description: (Server) Method: Player:SpectateEntity() Makes the player spectate the entity

Player:SprayDecal.description: (Server) Method: Player:SprayDecal() Makes a player spray their decal.

Player:SprintDisable.description: (Server) Method: Player:SprintDisable() Disables the sprint on the player. Not working! Use {{ClassFunction|Player|SetRunSpeed}} instead.

Player:SprintEnable.description: (Server) Method: Player:SprintEnable() Enables the sprint on the player. Not working! Use {{ClassFunction|Player|SetRunSpeed}} instead.

Player:SteamID.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SteamID() Returns the player's SteamID. In singleplayer, this will be STEAM_ID_PENDING serverside.

Player:SteamID64.description: (Shared) Method: Player:SteamID64() Returns the player's 64bit SteamID aka CommunityID.

Player:StopZooming.description: (Server) Method: Player:StopZooming() Turns off the zoom mode of the player.

Player:StripAmmo.description: (Server) Method: Player:StripAmmo() Removes all ammo from the player.

Player:StripWeapon.description: (Server) Method: Player:StripWeapon() Removes the specified weapon class from a certain player

Player:StripWeapons.description: (Server) Method: Player:StripWeapons() Removes all weapons from a certain player

Player:SuppressHint.description: (Server) Method: Player:SuppressHint() Prevents a hint from showing up.

Player:SwitchToDefaultWeapon.description: (Server) Method: Player:SwitchToDefaultWeapon() Attempts to switch the player weapon to the one specified in the "cl_defaultweapon" convar, if the player does not own the specified weapon nothing will happen.

Player:Team.description: (Shared) Method: Player:Team() Returns the player's team ID.

Player:TimeConnected.description: (Server) Method: Player:TimeConnected() Returns the time in second since the player connected.

Player:TraceHullAttack.body: TraceHullAttack(${1:Vector startPos}, ${2:Vector endPos}, ${3:Vector mins}, ${4:Vector maxs}, ${5:number damage}, ${6:Vector damageFlags}, ${7:number damageForce}, ${8:boolean damageAllNPCs})$0
Player:TraceHullAttack.description: (Server) Method: Player:TraceHullAttack() Performs a trace hull and applies damage to the entities hit, returns the first entity hit.

Player:TranslateWeaponActivity.description: (Shared) Method: Player:TranslateWeaponActivity() Translates {{Enum|ACT}} according to the holdtype of players currently held weapon.

Player:UnfreezePhysicsObjects.description: (Shared) Method: Player:UnfreezePhysicsObjects() Unfreezes all objects the player has frozen with their Physics Gun. Same as double pressing R while holding Physics Gun.

Player:UniqueID.description: (Shared) Method: Player:UniqueID() {{Warning|'''This function has collisions,''' where more than one player has the same UniqueID. It is '''highly''' recommended to use {{ClassFunction|Player|AccountID}}, {{ClassFunction|Player|SteamID}} or {{ClassFunction|Player|SteamID64}} instead, which are guaranteed to be unique to each player.}}

Player:UniqueIDTable.description: (Shared) Method: Player:UniqueIDTable() Returns a table that will stay allocated for the specific player between connects until the server shuts down. Note, that this table is not synchronized between client and server.

Player:UnLock.description: (Server) Method: Player:UnLock() Unlocks the player movement if locked previously.

Player:UnSpectate.description: (Server) Method: Player:UnSpectate() Stops the player from spectating another entity.

Player:UserID.description: (Shared) Method: Player:UserID() Returns the player's ID.

Player:ViewPunch.description: (Shared) Method: Player:ViewPunch() Simulates a push on the client's screen.

Player:ViewPunchReset.description: (Shared) Method: Player:ViewPunchReset() Resets the player's view punch ( {{ClassFunction|Player|ViewPunch}} ) effect back to normal.

Player:VoiceVolume.description: (Client) Method: Player:VoiceVolume() Returns the players voice volume as a normal number. Doesn't work on local player unless the voice_loopback convar is set to 1.

ProjectedTexture:GetAngles.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:GetAngles() Returns the angle of the ProjectedTexture, which were previously set by {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetAngles}}

ProjectedTexture:GetBrightness.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:GetBrightness() Returns the brightness of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetBrightness}}

ProjectedTexture:GetColor.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:GetColor() Returns the color of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetColor}}

ProjectedTexture:GetEnableShadows.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:GetEnableShadows() Returns whether shadows are enabled for this ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetEnableShadows}}

ProjectedTexture:GetFarZ.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:GetFarZ() Returns the projection distance of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetFarZ}}

ProjectedTexture:GetHorizontalFOV.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:GetHorizontalFOV() Returns the horizontal FOV of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetHorizontalFOV}} or {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetFOV}}

ProjectedTexture:GetNearZ.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:GetNearZ() Returns the NearZ value of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetNearZ}}

ProjectedTexture:GetOrthographic.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:GetOrthographic() Returns the current orthographic settings of the Projected Texture. To set these values, use {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetOrthographic}}.

ProjectedTexture:GetPos.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:GetPos() Returns the position of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetPos}}

ProjectedTexture:GetTexture.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:GetTexture() Returns the texture of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetTexture}}

ProjectedTexture:GetTextureFrame.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:GetTextureFrame() Returns the texture frame of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetTextureFrame}}

ProjectedTexture:GetVerticalFOV.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:GetVerticalFOV() Returns the vertical FOV of the ProjectedTexture, which was previously set by {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetVerticalFOV}} or {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|SetFOV}}

ProjectedTexture:IsValid.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:IsValid() Returns true if the projected texture is valid (i.e. has not been removed), false otherwise.

ProjectedTexture:Remove.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:Remove() Removes the projected texture. After calling this, {{ClassFunction|ProjectedTexture|IsValid}} will return false, and any hooks with the projected texture as the identifier will be automatically deleted.

ProjectedTexture:SetAngles.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:SetAngles() Sets the angles (direction) of the projected texture.

ProjectedTexture:SetBrightness.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:SetBrightness() Sets the brightness of the projected texture.

ProjectedTexture:SetColor.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:SetColor() Sets the color of the projected texture.

ProjectedTexture:SetEnableShadows.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:SetEnableShadows() Enable or disable shadows cast from the projected texture.

ProjectedTexture:SetFarZ.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:SetFarZ() Sets the distance at which the projected texture ends.

ProjectedTexture:SetFOV.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:SetFOV() Sets the angle of projection.

ProjectedTexture:SetHorizontalFOV.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:SetHorizontalFOV() Sets the horizontal angle of projection without affecting the vertical angle.

ProjectedTexture:SetNearZ.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:SetNearZ() Sets the distance at which the projected texture begins its projection.

ProjectedTexture:SetOrthographic.body: SetOrthographic(${1:boolean orthographic}, ${2:number left}, ${3:number top}, ${4:number right}, ${5:number bottom})$0
ProjectedTexture:SetOrthographic.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:SetOrthographic() Changes the current projected texture between orthographic and perspective projection.

ProjectedTexture:SetPos.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:SetPos() Move the Projected Texture to the specified position.

ProjectedTexture:SetTexture.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:SetTexture() Sets the texture to be projected.

ProjectedTexture:SetTextureFrame.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:SetTextureFrame() For animated textures, this will choose which frame in the animation will be projected.

ProjectedTexture:SetVerticalFOV.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:SetVerticalFOV() Sets the vertical angle of projection without affecting the horizontal angle.

ProjectedTexture:Update.description: (Client) Method: ProjectedTexture:Update() Updates the Projected Light and applies all previously set parameters.

Schedule:AddTask.description: (Server) Method: Schedule:AddTask() {{Stub}} Adds a task to the schedule.

Schedule:EngTask.description: (Server) Method: Schedule:EngTask() Adds an engine task to the schedule.

Schedule:GetTask.description: (Server) Method: Schedule:GetTask() Returns the task at the given index.

Schedule:Init.description: (Server) Method: Schedule:Init() {{Internal}} Initialises the Schedule. Called by {{LibraryFunction|ai_schedule|New}} when the Schedule is created.

Schedule:NumTasks.description: (Server) Method: Schedule:NumTasks() Returns the number of tasks in the schedule.

Stack:Pop.description: (Shared) Method: Stack:Pop() Pop an item from the stack

Stack:Push.description: (Shared) Method: Stack:Push() Push an item onto the stack

Stack:Size.description: (Shared) Method: Stack:Size() Returns the size of the stack

Stack:Top.description: (Shared) Method: Stack:Top() Get the item at the top of the stack

Task:Init.description: (Server) Method: Task:Init() {{Internal}} Initialises the AI task. Called by {{LibraryFunction|ai_task|New}}.

Task:InitEngine.description: (Server) Method: Task:InitEngine() Initialises the AI task as an engine task.

Task:InitFunctionName.description: (Server) Method: Task:InitFunctionName() Initialises the AI task as NPC method-based.

Task:IsEngineType.description: (Server) Method: Task:IsEngineType() Determines if the task is an engine task (''TYPE_ENGINE'', 1).

Task:IsFNameType.description: (Server) Method: Task:IsFNameType() Determines if the task is an NPC method-based task (''TYPE_FNAME'', 2).

Task:Run.description: (Server) Method: Task:Run() Runs the AI task.

Task:Run_FName.description: (Server) Method: Task:Run_FName() {{Internal}} Runs the AI task as an NPC method. This requires the task to be of type ''TYPE_FNAME''.

Task:Start.description: (Server) Method: Task:Start() Starts the AI task.

Task:Start_FName.description: (Server) Method: Task:Start_FName() {{Internal}} Starts the AI task as an NPC method.

Tool:ClearObjects.description: (Shared) Method: Tool:ClearObjects() Clears all objects previously set with {{ClassFunction|Tool|SetObject}}.

Tool:GetBone.description: (Shared) Method: Tool:GetBone() Retrieves a physics bone number previously stored using {{ClassFunction|Tool|SetObject}}.

TOOL:GetClientInfo.description: (Shared) Method: TOOL:GetClientInfo() Attempts to grab a clientside tool ConVar.

TOOL:GetClientNumber.description: (Shared) Method: TOOL:GetClientNumber() Attempts to grab a clientside tool ConVar.

Tool:GetEnt.description: (Shared) Method: Tool:GetEnt() Retrieves an Entity previously stored using {{ClassFunction|Tool|SetObject}}.

Tool:GetOperation.description: (Shared) Method: Tool:GetOperation() Returns the current operation of the tool set by {{ClassFunction|Tool|SetOperation}}.

TOOL:GetOwner.description: (Shared) Method: TOOL:GetOwner() Returns the owner of this tool.

TOOL:GetServerInfo.description: (Shared) Method: TOOL:GetServerInfo() Attempts to grab a serverside tool ConVar.

Tool:GetStage.description: (Shared) Method: Tool:GetStage() Returns the current stage of the tool set by {{ClassFunction|Tool|SetStage}}.

Tool:NumObjects.description: (Shared) Method: Tool:NumObjects() Returns the amount of stored objects ( Entitys ) the tool has.

TOOL:SetObject.body: SetObject(${1:number id}, ${2:Entity ent}, ${3:Vector pos}, ${4:PhysObj phys}, ${5:number bone}, ${6:Vector norm})$0
TOOL:SetObject.description: (Shared) Method: TOOL:SetObject() Stores an Entity for later use in the tool.

Tool:SetOperation.description: (Shared) Method: Tool:SetOperation() Sets the current operation of the tool. Does nothing clientside. See also {{ClassFunction|Tool|SetStage}}.

Tool:SetStage.description: (Shared) Method: Tool:SetStage() Sets the current stage of the tool. Does nothing clientside.

Vector:Add.description: (Shared) Method: Vector:Add() Adds the values of the second vector to the orignal vector, this function can be used to avoid garbage collection.

Vector:Angle.description: (Shared) Method: Vector:Angle() Returns an angle representing the normal of the vector.

Vector:AngleEx.description: (Shared) Method: Vector:AngleEx() Returns the angle of the vector, but instead of assuming that up is {{GlobalFunction|Vector}}( 0, 0, 1 ) (Like {{ClassFunction|Vector|Angle}} does) you can specify which direction is 'up' for the angle.

Vector:Cross.description: (Shared) Method: Vector:Cross() Calculates the cross product of this vector and the passed one.

Vector:Distance.description: (Shared) Method: Vector:Distance() Returns the pythagorean distance between the vector and the other vector.

Vector:DistToSqr.description: (Shared) Method: Vector:DistToSqr() Returns the squared distance of 2 vectors, this is faster than {{ClassFunction|Vector|Distance}} as calculating the square root is an expensive process.

Vector:Dot.description: (Shared) Method: Vector:Dot() Returns the [[wikipedia:Dot product#Geometric definition|dot product]] of this vector and the passed one.

Vector:DotProduct.description: (Shared) Method: Vector:DotProduct() {{Deprecated|This is an alias of {{ClassFunction|Vector|Dot}}. Use that instead.}}Returns the dot product of the two vectors.

Vector:GetNormalized.description: (Shared) Method: Vector:GetNormalized() Returns a normalized version of the vector. Normalized means vector with same direction but with length of 1.

Vector:IsEqualTol.description: (Shared) Method: Vector:IsEqualTol() Returns if the vector is equal to another vector with the given tolerance.

Vector:IsZero.description: (Shared) Method: Vector:IsZero() Checks whenever all fields of the vector are 0.

Vector:Length.description: (Shared) Method: Vector:Length() Returns the Euclidean length of the vector: √ x² + y² + z²

Vector:Length2D.description: (Shared) Method: Vector:Length2D() Returns the length of the vector in two dimensions, without the Z axis.

Vector:Length2DSqr.description: (Shared) Method: Vector:Length2DSqr() Returns the squared length of the vectors x and y value, x² + y².

Vector:LengthSqr.description: (Shared) Method: Vector:LengthSqr() Returns the squared length of the vector, x² + y² + z².

Vector:Mul.description: (Shared) Method: Vector:Mul() Scales the vector by the given number, that means x, y and z are multiplied by that value.

Vector:Normalize.description: (Shared) Method: Vector:Normalize() Normalizes the given vector. This changes the vector you call it on, if you want to return a normalized copy without affecting the original, use {{ClassFunction|Vector|GetNormalized}}.

Vector:Rotate.description: (Shared) Method: Vector:Rotate() Rotates a vector by the given angle.

Vector:Set.description: (Shared) Method: Vector:Set() Copies the values from the second vector to the first vector.

Vector:Sub.description: (Shared) Method: Vector:Sub() Substracts the values of the second vector from the orignal vector, this function can be used to avoid garbage collection.

Vector:ToColor.description: (Shared) Method: Vector:ToColor() Translates the vector normalized vector ( length is 1 ) into a {{Struct|Color}}.

Vector:ToScreen.description: (Client) Method: Vector:ToScreen() Returns where on the screen the specified position vector would appear. A related function is {{LibraryFunction|gui|ScreenToVector}}, which converts a 2D coordinate to a 3D direction.

Vector:WithinAABox.description: (Shared) Method: Vector:WithinAABox() Returns whenever the given vector is in a box created by the 2 other vectors.

Vector:Zero.description: (Shared) Method: Vector:Zero() Sets x, y and z to 0.

Vehicle:BoostTimeLeft.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:BoostTimeLeft() Returns the remaining boosting time left.

Vehicle:EnableEngine.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:EnableEngine() Sets whether the engine is enabled or disabled, i.e. can be started or not.

Vehicle:GetAmmo.description: (Client) Method: Vehicle:GetAmmo() Returns information about the ammo of the vehicle

Vehicle:GetCameraDistance.description: (Shared) Method: Vehicle:GetCameraDistance() Returns third person camera distance.

Vehicle:GetDriver.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:GetDriver() Gets the driver of the vehicle, returns NULL if no driver is present.

Vehicle:GetHLSpeed.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:GetHLSpeed() Returns the current speed of the vehicle in Half-Life Hammer Units (in/s). Same as {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetVelocity}} + {{ClassFunction|Vector|Length}}.

Vehicle:GetMaxSpeed.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:GetMaxSpeed() Returns the max speed of the vehicle in MPH.

Vehicle:GetOperatingParams.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:GetOperatingParams() Returns some info about the vehicle.

Vehicle:GetPassenger.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:GetPassenger() Gets the passenger of the vehicle, returns NULL if no drivers is present.

Vehicle:GetPassengerSeatPoint.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:GetPassengerSeatPoint() Returns the seat position and angle of a given passenger seat.

Vehicle:GetRPM.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:GetRPM() Returns the current RPM of the vehicle. This value is fake and doesn't actually affect the vehicle movement.

Vehicle:GetSpeed.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:GetSpeed() Returns the current speed of the vehicle in MPH.

Vehicle:GetSteering.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:GetSteering() Returns the current steering of the vehicle.

Vehicle:GetSteeringDegrees.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:GetSteeringDegrees() Returns the maximum steering degree of the vehicle

Vehicle:GetThirdPersonMode.description: (Shared) Method: Vehicle:GetThirdPersonMode() Returns if vehicle has thirdperson mode enabled or not.

Vehicle:GetThrottle.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:GetThrottle() Returns the current throttle of the vehicle.

Vehicle:GetVehicleClass.description: (Shared) Method: Vehicle:GetVehicleClass() Returns the vehicle class name. This is only useful for Sandbox spawned vehicles or any vehicle that properly sets the vehicle class with {{ClassFunction|Vehicle|SetVehicleClass}}.

Vehicle:GetVehicleParams.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:GetVehicleParams() Returns the vehicle parameters of given vehicle.

Vehicle:GetVehicleViewPosition.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:GetVehicleViewPosition() Returns the view position and forward angle of a given passenger seat.

Vehicle:GetWheel.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:GetWheel() Returns the PhysObj of given wheel.

Vehicle:GetWheelBaseHeight.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:GetWheelBaseHeight() Returns the base wheel height.

Vehicle:GetWheelContactPoint.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:GetWheelContactPoint() Returns the wheel contact point.

Vehicle:GetWheelCount.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:GetWheelCount() Returns the wheel count of the vehicle

Vehicle:GetWheelTotalHeight.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:GetWheelTotalHeight() Returns the total wheel height.

Vehicle:HasBoost.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:HasBoost() Returns whether this vehicle has boost at all.

Vehicle:HasBrakePedal.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:HasBrakePedal() Returns whether this vehicle has a brake pedal. See {{ClassFunction|Vehicle|SetHasBrakePedal}}.

Vehicle:IsBoosting.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:IsBoosting() Returns whether this vehicle is currently boosting or not.

Vehicle:IsEngineEnabled.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:IsEngineEnabled() Returns whether the engine is enabled or not, i.e. whether it can be started.

Vehicle:IsEngineStarted.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:IsEngineStarted() Returns whether the engine is started or not.

Vehicle:IsValidVehicle.description: (Shared) Method: Vehicle:IsValidVehicle() Returns true if the vehicle object is a valid or not. This will return false when Vehicle functions are not usable on the vehicle.

Vehicle:IsVehicleBodyInWater.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:IsVehicleBodyInWater() Returns whether this vehicle's engine is underwater or not. ( Internally the attachment point "engine" or "vehicle_engine" is checked )

Vehicle:SetBoost.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:SetBoost() Sets the boost. It is possible that this function does not work while the vehicle has a valid driver in it.

Vehicle:SetCameraDistance.description: (Shared) Method: Vehicle:SetCameraDistance() Sets the third person camera distance of the vehicle.

Vehicle:SetHasBrakePedal.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:SetHasBrakePedal() Sets whether this vehicle has a brake pedal.

Vehicle:SetMaxReverseThrottle.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:SetMaxReverseThrottle() Sets maximum reverse throttle

Vehicle:SetMaxThrottle.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:SetMaxThrottle() Sets maximum forward throttle

Vehicle:SetSpringLength.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:SetSpringLength() Sets spring length of given wheel

Vehicle:SetSteering.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:SetSteering() Sets the steering of the vehicle.

Vehicle:SetSteeringDegrees.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:SetSteeringDegrees() Sets the maximum steering degrees of the vehicle

Vehicle:SetThirdPersonMode.description: (Shared) Method: Vehicle:SetThirdPersonMode() Sets the third person mode state.

Vehicle:SetThrottle.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:SetThrottle() Sets the throttle of the vehicle. It is possible that this function does not work with a valid driver in it.

Vehicle:SetVehicleClass.description: (Shared) Method: Vehicle:SetVehicleClass() {{Internal}}Sets the vehicle class name.

Vehicle:SetVehicleEntryAnim.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:SetVehicleEntryAnim() Sets whether the entry or exit camera animation should be played or not.

Vehicle:SetVehicleParams.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:SetVehicleParams() Sets the vehicle parameters for given vehicle.

Vehicle:SetWheelFriction.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:SetWheelFriction() Sets friction of given wheel. {{Validate}} This function may be broken.

Vehicle:StartEngine.description: (Server) Method: Vehicle:StartEngine() Starts or stops the engine.

VMatrix:GetAngles.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:GetAngles() Returns the absolute rotation of the matrix.

VMatrix:GetField.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:GetField() Returns a specific field in the matrix.

VMatrix:GetForward.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:GetForward() Gets the forward direction of the matrix.

VMatrix:GetInverse.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:GetInverse() Returns an inverted matrix without modifying the original matrix.

VMatrix:GetInverseTR.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:GetInverseTR() Returns an inverted matrix without modifying the original matrix. This function will not fail, but only works correctly on matrices that contain only translation and/or rotation.

VMatrix:GetRight.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:GetRight() Gets the right direction of the matrix.

VMatrix:GetScale.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:GetScale() Returns the absolute scale of the matrix.

VMatrix:GetTranslation.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:GetTranslation() Returns the absolute translation of the matrix.

VMatrix:GetUp.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:GetUp() Gets the up direction of the matrix.

VMatrix:Identity.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:Identity() Initializes the matrix as Identity matrix.

VMatrix:InvertTR.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:InvertTR() Inverts the matrix. This function will not fail, but only works correctly on matrices that contain only translation and/or rotation.

VMatrix:IsIdentity.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:IsIdentity() Returns whether the matrix is equal to Identity matrix or not.

VMatrix:IsRotationMatrix.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:IsRotationMatrix() Returns whether the matrix is a rotation matrix or not.

VMatrix:Rotate.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:Rotate() Rotates the matrix by the given angle.

VMatrix:Scale.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:Scale() Scales the matrix by the given vector.

VMatrix:ScaleTranslation.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:ScaleTranslation() Scales the absolute translation with the given value.

VMatrix:Set.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:Set() Copies values from the given matrix object.

VMatrix:SetAngles.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:SetAngles() Sets the absolute rotation of the matrix.

VMatrix:SetField.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:SetField() Sets a specific field in the matrix.

VMatrix:SetForward.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:SetForward() Sets the forward direction of the matrix.

VMatrix:SetRight.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:SetRight() Sets the right direction of the matrix.

VMatrix:SetScale.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:SetScale() Modifies the scale of the matrix while preserving the rotation and translation.

VMatrix:SetTranslation.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:SetTranslation() Sets the absolute translation of the matrix.

VMatrix:SetUp.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:SetUp() Sets the up direction of the matrix.

VMatrix:ToTable.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:ToTable() Converts the matrix to a 4x4 table. See {{GlobalFunction|Matrix}} function.

VMatrix:Translate.description: (Shared) Method: VMatrix:Translate() Translates the matrix by the given vector aka. adds the vector to the translation.

Weapon:AllowsAutoSwitchFrom.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:AllowsAutoSwitchFrom() Returns whether the weapon allows to being switched from when a better ( {{ClassFunction|Weapon|GetWeight}} ) weapon is being picked up.

Weapon:AllowsAutoSwitchTo.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:AllowsAutoSwitchTo() Returns whether the weapon allows to being switched to when a better ( {{ClassFunction|Weapon|GetWeight}} ) weapon is being picked up.

Weapon:CallOnClient.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:CallOnClient() Calls a SWEP function on client.

Weapon:Clip1.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:Clip1() Returns how much primary ammo is in the magazine.

Weapon:Clip2.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:Clip2() Returns how much secondary ammo is in magazine.

Weapon:DefaultReload.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:DefaultReload() Forces the weapon to reload while playing given animation.

Weapon:GetActivity.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:GetActivity() Returns the sequence enumeration number that the weapon is playing.

Weapon:GetHoldType.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:GetHoldType() Returns the hold type of the weapon.

Weapon:GetMaxClip1.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:GetMaxClip1() Returns maximum primary clip size

Weapon:GetMaxClip2.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:GetMaxClip2() Returns maximum secondary clip size

Weapon:GetNextPrimaryFire.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:GetNextPrimaryFire() Gets the next time the weapon can primary fire. ( Can call {{HookFunction|WEAPON|PrimaryAttack}} )

Weapon:GetNextSecondaryFire.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:GetNextSecondaryFire() Gets the next time the weapon can secondary fire. ( Can call {{HookFunction|WEAPON|SecondaryAttack}} )

Weapon:GetPrimaryAmmoType.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:GetPrimaryAmmoType() Gets the primary ammo type of the given weapon.

Weapon:GetPrintName.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:GetPrintName() Returns the non-internal name of the weapon, that should be for displaying.

Weapon:GetSecondaryAmmoType.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:GetSecondaryAmmoType() Gets the ammo type of the given weapons secondary fire.

Weapon:GetSlot.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:GetSlot() Returns the slot of the weapon (slot numbers start from 0)

Weapon:GetSlotPos.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:GetSlotPos() Returns slot position of the weapon

Weapon:GetWeaponViewModel.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:GetWeaponViewModel() Returns the view model of the weapon.

Weapon:GetWeaponWorldModel.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:GetWeaponWorldModel() Returns the world model of the weapon.

Weapon:GetWeight.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:GetWeight() Returns the "weight" of the weapon, which is used when deciding which Weapon is better by the engine.

Weapon:HasAmmo.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:HasAmmo() Returns whether the weapon has ammo left or not. It will return false when there's no ammo left in the magazine '''and''' when there's no reserve ammo left.

Weapon:IsCarriedByLocalPlayer.description: (Client) Method: Weapon:IsCarriedByLocalPlayer() Returns whenever the weapon is carried by the local player.

Weapon:IsScripted.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:IsScripted() Checks if the weapon is a SWEP or a built-in weapon.

Weapon:IsWeaponVisible.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:IsWeaponVisible() Returns whether the weapon is visible. The term visibility is not exactly what gets checked here, first it checks if the owner is a player, then checks if the active view model has EF_NODRAW flag NOT set.

Weapon:LastShootTime.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:LastShootTime() Returns the time since this weapon last fired a bullet with {{ClassFunction|Entity|FireBullets}} in seconds. It is not networked.

Weapon:SendWeaponAnim.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:SendWeaponAnim() Forces weapon to play activity/animation.

Weapon:SetClip1.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:SetClip1() Lets you change the number of bullets in the given weapons primary clip.

Weapon:SetClip2.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:SetClip2() Lets you change the number of bullets in the given weapons secondary clip.

Weapon:SetHoldType.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:SetHoldType() Sets the hold type of the weapon. This function also calls {{HookFunction|WEAPON|SetWeaponHoldType}} and properly networks it to all clients.

Weapon:SetLastShootTime.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:SetLastShootTime() Sets the time since this weapon last fired in seconds. Used in conjunction with {{ClassFunction|Weapon|LastShootTime}}

Weapon:SetNextPrimaryFire.description: (Shared) Method: Weapon:SetNextPrimaryFire() Sets when the weapon can fire again. Time should be based on {{GlobalFunction|CurTime}}.
